The online pharmacy is also popular for meds under heath categories like Anti-Anxiety, Pain Relief, Sleeping Pills, Men’s Health and Weight Lose. The same med was previously sold for $636.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can get in touch with the company by a live chat option provided on the website. The shipping of all the orders is done via popular courier companies like, FedEx, DHL and TNT. The website ships its products through some of the best names in the business and provides customers plenty of payment options to choose from. The URL represents a Canadian based online pharmacy, Canada Drugs, which sells generic and brand name drugs to their worldwide customers. The online store is approved by CIPA (Certified Canadian International Pharmacy) and MIPA. The online pharmacy is licensed by Manitoba Pharmaceutical Association and working since 2001. The website offers a wide array of prescription and over the counter drugs, one of the reasons why they have processed more than 7 million orders in last few years.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp\u003ECanadadisocuntrx.com redirects customers to their new URL, canadadrugs.com. The URL represents a Canadian based online pharmacy, Canada Drugs, which sells generic and brand name drugs to their worldwide customers. The online store is approved by CIPA (Certified Canadian International Pharmacy) and MIPA. The online pharmacy is licensed by Manitoba Pharmaceutical Association and working since 2001. The website offers a wide array of prescription and over the counter drugs, one of the reasons why they have processed more than 7 million orders in last few years. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EOther than wide range of drugs, the website also offers competitive prices for their listed drugs. For example, one of their most popular drugs, Plavix is available for only $1.97 per pill. The website also lists complete description of the all listed drugs which includes conditions treated by the specific drug, dosage recommendation, overdoing, warnings and side effects which is an excellent practice and also informational for buyers.   \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003ETo reach their customer support, customers can contact through toll free phone contact, email or lice chat. The website also requires valid prescription to process orders. Customers can download order form from the website, can fill it and send it back for the review of licensed doctors for process. The website also has a presence on major social media platforms. Customers can also pay through all major credit cards.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ECanadadiscountrx.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E The URL of canadadiscountrx.com leads to a different URL which shows that Canada Drugs is using multiple urls to get more traffic. The website offers free consultancy and prescriptions for medical problems such as Hepatitis C, Narcolepsy, Cholesterol, Anxiety and many other health disorders. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThis website claims to sell generic and branded medications by referring users to a suitable and authentic pharmacy of their choice. Generally the prices of these medicines are fairly low. For example, the best seller Pain Medication and Muscle Relaxant Sirdalud is available at $53.66 and a skin medication Augmentin is available in different packages for example 60 tablets of the product are available at $295.00. One impressive feature about this website is that it provides a thorough description of the available medicines. This enables users to acquaint themselves with these drugs and select according to their health requirements.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAllpharmacy.com deals with the most renowned pharmacies of Europe and India. It allows users to compare medicines and their prices to ease them with their ordering procedures. Customers can go through the It provides shipping to many countries of the world. Customers generally do not require a prescription to order any medication, however, if a prescription is needed in any case it can be provided by an online doctor. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003ESince this website does not sell medicines directly, shipping and ordering procedures can vary from one pharmacy to another. Same goes for the payment procedures. This website is more of a consultant site that can recommend customers to buy from a certain online pharmacy.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EAllpharmacymedicines.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAllpharmacymedicines.com has been functional for 11 years now. Normally, customers write reviews if they are either too happy with the pharmacy or if they are faked by a scam or illegitimate website. However, this website deserves a lot of reviews as it provides customers with ease while selecting a pharmacy. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAnother possible explanation for not having too many reviews is that the website does not have an efficient customer review forum. Had there been one, the customers may have given a thought of writing supportive or negative reviews about this website. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EAllpharmacymedicines.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E Not too much has changed for as far as the availability of reviews for the website is concerned. The website does not claim of any shipping charges as it does not directly sell medicines. Therefore, there is no certain shipping policy of the website. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EApart from these facts, the website has not been reviewed by many customers and therefore there still remains a question mark on its credibility. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/cialis-name-reviews-a-turkish-online-pharmacy-with-too-much-doubt\/","title":"Cialis.name Reviews – A Turkish Online Pharmacy With Too Much Doubt","url":"http:\/\/www.cialis.name","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Cialis.name-Review-880x320-1438268648.jpg","annotation":"Cialis.name is a Turkey based online pharmacy which sells a wide variety of Cialis products. The products offered by the online pharmacy are mainly concerned with Men’s Health problems, such as sexual issues, health issues, muscle relaxants, body building and more. However, the main product offered by the online pharmacy has been Cialis – male impotence solution. The core purpose of the website is to fight against fake manufacturers of generic Viagra – a popular male impotence treatment.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECialis.name is a Turkey based online pharmacy which sells a wide variety of Cialis products. The website was established in 2003 and has been operational ever since. Cialis Tadalafil tablets are manufactured by Ely Lilly companies. The products offered by the online pharmacy are mainly concerned with Men’s Health problems, such as sexual issues, health issues, muscle relaxants, body building and more. However, the main product offered by the online pharmacy has been Cialis – male impotence solution. The core purpose of the website is to fight against fake manufacturers of generic Viagra – a popular male impotence treatment.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is originally published in Turkish language due to which its translation does not exactly indicate what the author originally tried to say. The English translation seems quite vague at some places which induce confusion in the mind of the readers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECialis products are considered as the solution to Men’s Health problems and have helped men with disorders such as Erectile Dysfunction. It has also helped men improve their performance in bed and happier sex life. All Cialis products are available in Turkish currency on the website. For example, Cialis 20 mg 30 tablets are available for 99TL.\u003Cbr \/\u003E To order the product, customers are required to fill an online form available on the website, mentioning the name of product, payment method, patient name, telephone number and address. The online pharmacy accepts payment via cash on delivery and postal cheque account. On the other hand, its payment method and delivery options are not convincing enough to recommend it to the customers. Another point of concern is the lack of safety and security which may put customers in doubt.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Cialis.name-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Cialis.name Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11185\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website does not have any independent customer reviews in its favor, and there are no unfavorable reviews as well. The company posted a reply recommending 100mg Viagra or 100mg Cialis to treat his issue.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EHowever, the fact remains that the online pharmacy has too much to prove in order to get the recommendation.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECialis.name Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online Turkish pharmacy offers low price and discounts to its customers. Following are some important discounts offered by the website:\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E• Discount on Additional Packs: Cialis.name offers discount if the customer intends to purchase more than one pack of medicine. For example, 1 packet of Cialis 20mg 30 pills is available at 99TL while 3 packets are available at 209TL.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther discounts, special offers and coupon codes are not available on the website at present. However, recurring customers may find better opportunities to save in future.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECialis.name, as the name suggests, is an online pharmacy that offers erectile dysfunction pills to its customers. The website is based in Turkey and favors native customers. Authenticity and reliability of this online pharmacy is still questionable as there is no evidence whether it actually sells Cialis products with complete satisfaction. On the contrary, the website has been identified “Rogue” by legitscript.com which makes the case quite obvious that it’s not to be trusted. Based on the findings, the online pharmacy cannot be recommended and receives a rating of 2 out of 5.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/www.cialis.name\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The staff at ThriftMedsNow than consult a local physician who orders a Canadian prescription which is filled by Canadian pharmacist. This way, even non Canadian can buy prescription drugs from the website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website offers every type of drug related to any health condition based on the valid prescription. The process of prescription verification and delivery of products takes 8 to 12 days.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can pay through credit cards of Visa and MasterCard, money order or certified check for their orders. The website claims to offer up to 90% low prices on some of their drugs. For example, the website sells a package of 12 pills of Actonel for only $47 while the actual price of the drug is $816 thus offering a discount of 94%. The website sells both prescription and over the counter drugs to their customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website requires prescription to process the orders and customers need to create their online profiles to order from them. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/rapid-tabs-reviews-a-savior-or-source-of-mistrust\/","title":"Rapid Tabs Reviews – A Savior or Source of Mistrust?","url":"http:\/\/rapidtabs.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Rapidtabs.com-Review-880x320-1438271346.jpg","annotation":"Rapidtabs.com is an online pharmacy that targets to cater to men who are suffering from erectile dysfunction. This website promises to market to those who desire a better sexual lifestyle. As erectile dysfunction and sexual well-being are sensitive issues, there are many people who are hesitant to consult a doctor or physician about this issue. This is one of the biggest reasons why this website and similar websites exist.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp\u003ERapidtabs.com is an online pharmacy that targets to cater to men who are suffering from erectile dysfunction. This website promises to market to those who desire a better sexual lifestyle. As erectile dysfunction and sexual well-being are sensitive issues, there are many people who are hesitant to consult a doctor or physician about this issue. This is one of the biggest reasons why this website and similar websites exist.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThis website is easy to access and it conveys the right information to the people surfing the website. Moreover, this website allows people to sit at home, office or anywhere else and order medicines from them promptly. This website provides with both typed and video information of how tablets are made and what all compounds are used.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThe order system of the website is fairly simple and extremely user friendly. Full customer privacy is assured and there are no hidden costs associated with ordering from this online store. This company has provided two ways to place an order which include contacting them through the telephone or placing an order online. In fact, they also tend to send a confirmation electronic mail to the customer so that the customer knows what they’re ordering and delivery status of the order. The orders are shipped from a US pharmacy. All necessary information content about the pills is available on the “Information” section of this website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ERapidtabs.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E According to Legitscript.com which verifies online pharmaceutical store, this website is a “rogue” website which in other words means that it is not a website to be trusted.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Rapidtabs.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Rapidtabs.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11199\u0022 \/\u003E\u003Cbr \/\u003E The website also clearly mentions that being a “rogue” website means that this website is violating some sort of laws in the facilitation of drugs which should not be the case. It also mentions that the store does not uphold any or all of the safety regulations of pharmaceutical sales. Most importantly, it means that the website is fraud and should be avoided at any cost. This site was not also reported to be listed on the recommended sites of NABP. This points out that this business must be involved in some fraud practices that we are not all that aware of.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EOn one review website, only rating is available which is very low, 1.6 out of 5 based on the reviews from 612 customers.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Rapidtabs.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Rapidtabs.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11200\u0022 \/\u003E\u003Cbr \/\u003E Unfortunately, there were few customer reviews available of this website. This again puts questionable doubts over the company’s credibility because it could mean that no patients have ordered from this website or have not been full satisfied with the care provided to them by it. Most of the reviews available online were those from various pharmaceutical blogs and other reviewing websites.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAccording to an article in an online blog about the various upcoming pharmaceutical companies, this website does not seem credible at all, mostly due to the fact that there are no good or bad reviews available online about it. It also says in the same article that Scamvoid and Scamadvisor have given this company a very low trust rating of 0%. This company was also found to have a bad vendor reliability score on WOT.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Rapidtabs.com-Reviews2.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Rapidtabs.com Reviews2\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11201\u0022 \/\u003E\u003Cbr \/\u003E These factors clearly indicate that this website cannot and must not be trusted with any transactions as it might result in not only financial loss for the customers but could prove to be a health hazard for them as well. \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ERapidtabs.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EUpon searching extensively for any reviews for this website based in 2015, it was found that no customer reviews were available for this website in this year. In the search conducted, it was found that this website does not offer any specific discount coupons, packages or Coupon Codes. This could again be affirmation of the fact that this is not a website which can be easily relied upon.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAlthough, this website is set up in a very convenient way and is user friendly, it does not seem reliable at all. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/canadavet-reviews-pet-medicine-at-lowest-rates-but-poor-online-reputation\/","title":"Canadavet Reviews – Pet Medicine at Lowest Rates But Poor Online Reputation","url":"http:\/\/www.canadavet.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Canadavet.com-Review-880x320-1438266591.jpg","annotation":"Canadavet.com was formed in Vancouver, Canada in 2005. The online pharmacy provides pet medication at affordable rates. The company has long list of medicines for pet owners to choose from. With over 21,000 happy customers in Canada and USA, the website claims to have customer satisfaction percentage of over 95%. The consumers can purchase the meds in either US or Canadian Dollars. The website offer over-the-counter drugs, so the customers do not need any sort of prescription to buy these products. The online drug store has fully practicing, licensed and qualified surgeons to make sure that all the products are up to the required standard. Canadavet.com has a separate category of each animal under which there different sort of medications. Drugs are available for animals like dog, cats, horses, fish and even reptiles. The online pharmacy has its official account on all major social media networks such as Twitter, Facebook and Pinterest. The company offers full money back guarantee as far as the quality is concerned. For Over-the-counter drugs, customers can get a full refund if they changed their mind, provided the med is sealed.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadavet.com was formed in Vancouver, Canada in 2005. The online pharmacy provides pet medication at affordable rates. The company has long list of medicines for pet owners to choose from. With over 21,000 happy customers in Canada and USA, the website claims to have customer satisfaction percentage of over 95%. The consumers can purchase the meds in either US or Canadian Dollars. The website offer over-the-counter drugs, so the customers do not need any sort of prescription to buy these products. The online drug store has fully practicing, licensed and qualified surgeons to make sure that all the products are up to the required standard. Canadavet.com has a separate category of each animal under which there different sort of medications. Drugs are available for animals like dog, cats, horses, fish and even reptiles. The online pharmacy has its official account on all major social media networks such as Twitter, Facebook and Pinterest. The company offers full money back guarantee as far as the quality is concerned. For Over-the-counter drugs, customers can get a full refund if they changed their mind, provided the med is sealed.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECandavet.com also takes pride in providing the cheapest medications online. Top seller meds like Frontline, which is available in the market for US$59.70 is available at the website for only $39.89. Another famous drug Revolution is only available for US$39.74, while it is available in the market for $49. Heartgard is available for $28.79 instead of $39.95.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers have plenty of ways to get in touch with the online pharmacy. The website contains a toll-free fax and telephone number. Also, the website provides complete postal addresses as well as email address for customers. Customers also have the facility to call and talk to agents directly from 6am to 5 pm for any complaints or queries. The website also offers free shipping for order over US$88. The pharmacy accepts all major debit and credit cards. Customers also have the facility to pay through PayPal. It is also 100% secured and virus free.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadavet.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews about the online store are limited but can be found on the internet.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Canadavet.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadavet.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11180\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMost of the customer reviews about Canadavet.com were negative. According to many customers who reviewed the website declared it as a scam. A lot of customers said that the drugs delivered to them looked like they were from Singapore instead of Canada. The company was also criticized for selling expired medications. One of the customers dog almost died after the he gave him an expired medicine. Luckily, the dog was saved by a local vet. A lot of customers also complained that the website, although, promises to ship on time, did not kept its word. Their packages were delayed and the agents did not co-operate when they called them. The customers complained that the complaint center does not pay a lot of attention to what the customers have to say.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadavet.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs far as the year 2015 is concerned, the customer reviews were hard to find. However, last year the company did receive a few good reviews. The absence of customer reviews could mean that the company is either in shambles or out of business completely.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadavet.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDespite providing medicine at low rates, canadavet.com also offers some discount coupons for its customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EOn purchase of 6 pack of Frontline Plus, the customers get one Pipette free.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EOn purchase of 12 pack of Frontline Plus, the customers get 2 pipettes free.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EWith 6 or 12 pack of Revolution, the customers get a free glowing dog collar or a Kong Cat Toy.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website has an extremely user friendly lay out with almost all major meds at the front to make it easier for the customers to but the medicine of their choice. The website provides various mediums to customers to get in touch with the company such as phone, email, fax and postal address. However, they feedback from the customers regarding all these services has been extremely negative over the years. Even though the pharmacy is offering meds at low prices and some great discount coupons, the complaints regarding expired meds have put the company’s reputation in jeopardy. However, one good thing about the pharmacy is that it offers free shipping on orders over $88. The scam alert websites does not have good things to say about the pharmacy either as they declare it as an illegitimate website to order drugs. The online store claims to be one of the leading pharmacies in the world. The website offers thousands of prescription generic and brand name drugs along with over-the-counter products. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/destinyrx-reviews-a-pharmacy-with-a-low-trust-rating\/","title":"Destinyrx Reviews – A Pharmacy with a Low Trust Rating","url":"http:\/\/destinyrx.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Destinyrx.com-Review-880x320-1440687998.jpg","annotation":"Destinyrx.com is an online pharmacy offering health and medication services for various health issues. It is a European based pharmacy that has its station in Port Louis, Mauritius. The online store has been established for a long enough time and claims to provide FDA approved generic drugs.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDestinyrx.com is an online pharmacy offering health and medication services for various health issues. It is a European based pharmacy that has its station in Port Louis, Mauritius. The online store has been established for a long enough time and claims to provide FDA approved generic drugs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store sells medications for health issues such as Weight loss, Sexual Health, Anxiety and other miscellaneous health problems. The prices are affordable and relatively cheaper than most online pharmacies. For instance, 30 capsules of Yerba Diet are available at $49.00 and 10 tablets of 100mg Viagra are available at $189.00. One impressive feature about this website is that it provides details regarding the medications and it shows the side effects of a certain medicine. This enables customers to choose the best medicine according to their health nature. Some of the medicines do not show prices this could be because their prices are discontinued or they may are still going through a pricing procedure.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EShipping and ordering from this online store is convenient and easy. Users can log on to the website to register their orders. Expected delivery time is 21 to 28 days and shipping and handling charges per order are $20.00. Priority shipping and handling charges area $30.00.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDestinyrx.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to the reviews available about this website, the website can be considered suspicious for its services and medications. Customers have accused the website for scamming. Customers also complained about the website not delivering their products on time. These reviews are not something overwhelmingly positive and hence they can cost the website a great deal.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ELisa says that she was shocked at the services of the website even after being a loyal customer of this online store. She warned other potential buyers to avoid the website and consider ordering from somewhere else.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Destinyrx.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Destinyrx.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11458\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther reviews also suggest that the website does not deliver the orders after taking the money. For example, Viagra is available for $23.25 for the purchase of 50 pills. It looks like that Pharmacyexpress.com represents a different online pharmacy few years ago, but after the domain expiration, it is bough by the New Zealand based online store that redirects their old customers to their website. The online pharmacy promises to sell drugs from world’s major brand on low prices.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIt sells generic form known pharmaceutical companies and offers speedy delivery, best customer service, great prices and same day delivery for New Zealand based customers. Drugs are listed under multiple health conditions on the website which includes allergies, quit smoking, hair care, pain relief, nutritional supplements and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their wide array of options, the prices offered are also less if compared to retail prices. The online pharmacy offers 100% Free shipping to all their worldwide customers on all orders that worth more than $100.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ESave More After Buying More. The online store offers attractive discounts for buying in bulk or more than two products. For example, if you buy Nicotrol 2mg mint gum 105, it costs $30.99 but if you buy more than 12 pieces together, the price for per packet will be only $20.14.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EActive coupon codes are currently not available but customers can check back later for valid ones.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacyexpress.com was a different store few years ago but now it represents Top Brands For Less online pharmacy as it redirects to the new domain, topbrandsforless.com. The design of the website is not attractive and needs improvement. All the necessary information is available at the homepage but the structure needs improvement. Prices are affordable but lack of customer reviews is alarming. Trust rating is above average by most of the scam alert websites but for some reasons, it is rated as Rogue pharmacy by Legit Script. Overall, the website looks a good option for customers especially for those who are living in New Zealand due to quick delivery. All in all, the website deserves 3 out of 5 star rating.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/pharmacyonline365.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E3\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The Australia based online pharmacy was established in 1995 and is a family owned business. The company sells a wide range of high quality pet healthcare products. The primary focus is on dogs, cats, birds, rodents, horse and fish etc.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe pet meds pharmacy claims to provide best solutions for canine disease, feline disease such as inflamed bowel which is caused by whipworm. The medicines are available for sale without prescription and they are available at reasonable prices. In fact, customers can buy these medicines at comparatively low prices than the market price. All products offered by the pet pharmacy are recommended and manufactured by reputable companies in Australia and other countries. Some popular products include Heartgard, Frontline Plus, Sentinel, Top Spot, Comfortis, Advantix and many more!\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers are offered with 100% guarantee of high quality medications. Customers can find lucrative saving opportunities on the website with most medicines available with discount. The pet supplies website offers toll free number for US and UK based customers, customers from other countries can call on the Australian landline. Customers can also send their queries by filling an online support form on the website, and they can also contact via postal mail. Customers ordering pet medications can pay via credit card including Visa, MasterCard and AMEX. Customers can also pay via PayPal.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPets-megastore.com.au Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe Australian pet pharmacy has received quite a few customer reviews through website testimonials. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/lifestyle-drugstore-reviews-a-genuine-online-option-for-low-cost-drugs\/","title":"Lifestyle-drugstore Reviews – A Genuine Online Option for Low Cost Drugs","url":"http:\/\/lifestyle-drugstore.xyz","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Lifestyle-drugstore.xyz-Review1-880x320-1437534417.jpg","annotation":"Life-Style Drug store acts as a broker for many pharmaceutical companies between customers and the pharmacies. It is an online drug store which provides medication facilities for different health issues such as Allergy, Cholesterol, Men’s Health, Women’s health, Anxiety, Blood Pressure and other health issues. The store claims to provide 100% quality medication with very fast shipping, quick and guaranteed delivery with online order tracking at affordable prices. Most of the users have complained about eroids.com giving good scores to scam websites such as “pharmacore” which was considered by the users as an average website:\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEroids.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThere are hardly any reviews regarding Eroids in 2015. By judging with the comments of people in the earlier reviews an appropriate guess would be that people are not too bothered about the popularity of the website. Instead they are more interested in the online stores that are marketed by Eroids. Although the website has very few reviews for its own, users continue to access the website and share their reviews about different online pharmacy stores. It would be safe to say that no or negative reviews have not damaged the status of the website to a great extent. However, for long term business the website is recommended to improve their scoring criteria and filtering techniques so that the users may access the very best online pharmaceuticals without any confusion.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Eroids.com-Reviews3.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Eroids.com Reviews3\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11023\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIndependent website such as “legitscript” has also shown mistrust in Eroids.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThis could be due to any registration or documentation issues because Eroids itself is not an online pharmacy. Therefore it does not need to comply with the medical and pharmacy standards. “Legitscript” declared the website as “Rogue” because of the reasons mentioned above.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEroids.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEroids.com does not offer any coupon codes of its own as it is not a pharmacy itself. However, it advertises the discount offers present on different websites for ease of its users.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEroids.com is a review website for online customers to help the buyers ease through the shopping process by comparing different products and their prices and also keeping in mind the discount offers that are present on certain websites. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/drugprice-reviews-not-an-online-pharmacy-but-a-kenyan-website-to-check-drug-prices\/","title":"Drugprice Reviews – Not an Online Pharmacy but a Kenyan Website to Check Drug Prices","url":"http:\/\/drugprice.org","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Drugprice.org-Review-880x320-1440075798.jpg","annotation":"Drugprice.org is a Kenyan based website that is not an online pharmacy, but serves as a reference pricing system which provides detailed information about large number of different drugs along with their standard prices to keep prices in check. The purpose of the drugprice.org is to not to let pharmaceutical companies to charge more on their price as the detailed system calculates prices in Kenya based on the international prices, shipping costs and other add-ons.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugprice.org is a Kenyan based website that is not an online pharmacy, but serves as a reference pricing system which provides detailed information about large number of different drugs along with their standard prices to keep prices in check. The purpose of the drugprice.org is to not to let pharmaceutical companies to charge more on their price as the detailed system calculates prices in Kenya based on the international prices, shipping costs and other add-ons.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe guide provides a detailed drug price referencing guide to all public procurement agencies based on all the medicines listed under KEML (Kenya Essential Medicine List). The website runs under TI-Kenya, also known as Transparency International Kenya which is a non-profit organization that was founded in 1999. The goal of the organization and websites working under its umbrella like drugprice.org is to promote transparent, accountable and corruption free Kenya.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website also has presence on top social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook and YouTube. The website also provides information about large variety of drugs, their prices, drug formulation and prescription, and names of drug suppliers and their authenticity. Users or companies can make their own account on the website, view drug directory, read latest news on their official blog or make use of their android app on smart phones. The head office of the website is situated in Nairobi, Kenya while interested people can contact them through email or their phone contacts.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EDrugprice.org Reviews\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the website is not an online pharmacy, but it is a website runs by Transparency International Kenya which only provides information about drugs available in Kenya and their prices. The goal of the organization is to keep prices in check by the local Kenyan drug pharmacies and sellers. As the website is not selling anything, they don’t have any customer reviews or legitimacy rating from scam alert websites. It is an authentic website which is operated by a well known organization. The website is a good source but only for Kenyan people and companies.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EDrugprice.org Reviews 2015\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEven in 2015, there is no feedback as the website is not selling anything, so they don’t have any customers, but only visitors who seek information about medicines and their prices. As far as their authenticity is concerned, the website is authentic and operated by a well know non-profit organization.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EDrugprice.org Coupon Codes\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the website does not sell anything and just provides information related to standard prices of the drugs to keep pharmaceutical companies in check and to educate consumers, there are no offers or special deals listed on drugprice.org.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EConclusion\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is very simple in design but it provides all the information that it promises to provide. It also offers users to create their own personalized profile and also allows downloadable version of android app which helps users to use the website on their smart devices. They also host an informational blog along with active social media platforms. It is also operated by a well knownorganization, Transparency International Kenya which makes it authentic. All in all, the website is useful for price check of drugs but only for Kenyan people, this is why it is rated as 2.5 out of 5 due to its limited use.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/drugprice.org\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2.5\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/farmacia-es-reviews-a-risky-and-suspicious-spanish-online-pharmacy\/","title":"Farmacia-es Reviews – A Risky and Suspicious Spanish Online Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/www.farmacia-es.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Farmacia-es.com-Review-880x320-1440074536.jpg","annotation":"Farmacia-es.com is a Spanish website which represents Spain Online Pharmacy, an online store which sells a large variety of drugs to its customers. The featured products of the online pharmacy are mostly ED and sexual health drugs but the website also sells drugs related to Hair Loss and Diet Pills. The website claims to offer large variety of drugs that counter impotence and other similar problems. Some of the popular ED drugs available at the store are Viagra, Cialis, Levitra and Kamagra.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFarmacia-es.com is a Spanish website which represents Spain Online Pharmacy, an online store which sells a large variety of drugs to its customers. The featured products of the online pharmacy are mostly ED and sexual health drugs but the website also sells drugs related to Hair Loss and Diet Pills. The website claims to offer large variety of drugs that counter impotence and other similar problems. Some of the popular ED drugs available at the store are Viagra, Cialis, Levitra and Kamagra.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices are listed in Euro as the products are sold to customers in Spain. Prices are comparatively high as 4 pills of Viagra is available for 58 Euros. The website claims to offer original drugs instead of generics, one of the probable reasons why their prices are high.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website also has presence on different social media platforms but most of the accounts are inactive. The information about their shipping is not available but the website caters to the needs of customers in Spain. Information about their refund policy is not available. The website accepts all major credit cards as payment method. Customers can reach their staff through phone contact and email. The website is just of one page website with no other links except of product pages. One positive about the website is that they provide detailed information about each listed drug along with side effects.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EFarmacia-es.com Reviews\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is limited about the online store. Scam Adviser, another popular scam alert website also rated is as risky website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EFarmacia-es.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe only feedback the website received is on 18\u003Csup\u003Eth\u003C\/sup\u003EApril, 2015 which is in Spanish and rated the website 5 out of 5. On a popular review website, Trust Pilot, the website earns an overall rating of 7.4 out of 10. But other than that review, there is no more feedback about them. The only available discounts are in the form of trail packs as the website offers trail packs for both brand name and generic drugs. This allows customers to try out different version of sexual health drugs within a single pack without paying more for each drug separately. The online pharmacy offers 4 different trail packs under each category of brand name and generic drugs. For example, a trial pack that consists of brand name 10 Viagra pills and 4 Levitra pills is offered for only 125 Euro.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EConclusion\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website design is not only simple, but most of the links are not working on the website. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/canadapharmacytrust-reviews-low-prices-but-poor-online-reputation\/","title":"Canadapharmacytrust Reviews – Low Prices but Poor Online Reputation","url":"https:\/\/www.canadapharmacytrust.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Canadapharmacytrust.com-Review-880x320-1440678971.jpg","annotation":"Canadapharmacytrust.com is a URL which redirects to Canadian Pharmacy. Canadapharmacy.com previously known as ‘Canada Medicine Shop’ is an online drug pharmacy providing medication facilities to counter a vast group of health issues. The online pharmacy claims to have great fan following with more than 5.5 million happy customers. The website was initiated in 2001 and runs successfully ahead of most online stores in Canada.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadapharmacytrust.com is a URL which redirects to Canadian Pharmacy. Canadapharmacy.com previously known as ‘Canada Medicine Shop’ is an online drug pharmacy providing medication facilities to counter a vast group of health issues. The online pharmacy claims to have great fan following with more than 5.5 million happy customers. The website was initiated in 2001 and runs successfully ahead of most online stores in Canada.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThere is versatile variety of medication facilities available at this online store. It addresses to health deficiencies such as Arthritis, Erectile Dysfunction, Heart-Burn, Cholesterol and several others. It also provides pet medications and health advices. Customers can order medicines according to their requirements as these medicines are available in different packaging. An impressive feature about this website is that it provides a complete detail of usage, precautions and side effects. This enables customers to buy products depending on their health and allergy conditions. The medications are cheap and affordable. For instance, 28 tablets of 40 mg Benicar (Olmesartan) is available at $71 and Parsitan (Ethpropazine) is priced at $66.00 for 100 50mg tablets.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFor ordering a medication, customers first need to email an authorized prescription. Ordering procedure is simple as users can simply access the website or call on the given numbers. The website is also accessible to users if they are faced with any queries and question. They can even email the website for this purpose.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadapharmacytrust.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOne of the attractive features of this website is its Testimonial Forum. Users can share their experience and reviews the website which helps new customers with their purchasing. As per these reviews which are moderated by their own staff, Canadapharmacy.com has been trusted and appreciated by most customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAlice seems to enjoy the discount and special offers and she gave thumbs up to the online store.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Canadapharmacytrust.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadapharmacytrust.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11415\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ELynn appreciates the services of the website and vows to order again from the store.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Canadapharmacytrust.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadapharmacytrust.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11416\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAlthough these reviews reflect a popular image of this website, however, it is not enough evidence to term this website as trustworthy store. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/brandmeds-reviews-providing-wide-variety-of-branded-meds-but-risky-website\/","title":"Brandmeds Reviews – Providing Wide Variety of Branded Meds but Risky Website","url":"http:\/\/brandmeds.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Brandmeds.com-Review-880x320-1438828668.jpg","annotation":"Brandmeds.com is online pharmacy that sells a wide range of medicine. The company boasts for quality medicines, great service and extremely low pricing. The online pharmacy caters to the residents of Europe and America. All the meds available on the website are made by some popular companies. Brandsmed.com claims to sell medicines at extremely low prices with the same quality. The list of meds sold by the online pharmacy include, pain meds, allergy meds, medicated shampoos, erectile dysfunction, Heart, cholesterol, antibiotic, hair growth, epilepsy, obesity, hypertension, thyroid, sleeping, ulcer meds, diuretic, and a lot more. The website does not provide any telephone or fax numbers to customers, however, it does provide an email address through they can get in touch with the pharmacy.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp\u003EBrandmeds.com is online pharmacy that sells a wide range of medicine. The company boasts for quality medicines, great service and extremely low pricing. The online pharmacy caters to the residents of Europe and America. All the meds available on the website are made by some popular companies. Brandsmed.com claims to sell medicines at extremely low prices with the same quality. The list of meds sold by the online pharmacy include, pain meds, allergy meds, medicated shampoos, erectile dysfunction, Heart, cholesterol, antibiotic, hair growth, epilepsy, obesity, hypertension, thyroid, sleeping, ulcer meds, diuretic, and a lot more. The website does not provide any telephone or fax numbers to customers, however, it does provide an email address through they can get in touch with the pharmacy.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EIn addition to the wide range of medicines, the websites also offer some great prices to their consumers. Although, the prices aren’t mentioned on the websites, the company claims to sell them lower than many pharmacies. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EInformation regarding payment of meds isn’t available on the website either. However, customers can email the pharmacy to find out the payment procedures. The response time from the website in 24 hours from Monday to Friday.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EBrandmeds.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E The reviews regarding brandmeds.com were not available anywhere on Internet. It seemed as if the company has either gone bankrupt, or not making any sales what so ever because there was no customer feedback at all. The website itself didn’t have any section where customers could give any sort of comments about the online pharmacy. This goes to show that the website has very limited number of customers.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Brandmeds.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Brandmeds.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11284\u0022 \/\u003E\u003Cbr \/\u003E Other than lack of reviews, the trust rating from scam alert websites is also not promising. It is listed as unapproved pharmacy by Legit Script as it apparently fails to meet their verification standards set for online pharmacies. Other scam alert websites also rated it low for trustworthiness and safety.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EBased on lack of reviews and low trust rating from scam alert websites, there is a risk involved in doing business with this online pharmacy.\u003C\/p\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EBrandmeds.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThings didn’t change this year that is 2015, either. No customer feedback was found. Hardly any source had anything good or bad to say about the company but it is pretty evident from the website that it is not doing so well at all. It certainly seem like the online pharmacy is on the verge or shutting down, but we will have to wait and see if things get any better in the future.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAll in all, not a safe option to do business with.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EBrandmeds.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EJust like reviews, there were absolutely no coupon codes or discount vouchers on the website or any other sources. There are no deals on the medicines either. The pharmacy claimed to have low prices on meds, but even they aren’t mentioned on the website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EBrandmeds.com, despite containing large variety of medicines does not seem to have any business. There is lack of information on the website for the customers ad hardly any effective way to get in touch. The customers can only get in touch through email address and nothing else. Although websites claims to sell meds at lower prices, there are no prices available on the website. Considering all these factors, it pretty clear that the website is certainly not the right place to buy your medicines. To further proof its illegitimacy, the pharmacy is rated as rogue on scam alert websites. Therefore, the website only manages to get a star on the ratings. The drugs sold at the pharmacy are from all the licensed pharmacies in USA including names like Pfizer, gsk, MERCK and others. The website respects the customer privacy by keeping all the orders confidential. With discreet packaging, the medications are delivered at doorsteps. Edrugsonline.com has their own physicians, all licensed by the US government. The products available on the website are divided under the category of Men’s Health, Weight Loss, Sexual Health, Skin Care, Digestion, Personal Lubes, Allergies and Hairloss Treatments. Although there is a long list of medications available on the website, some of the best sellers include, Viagra, Cialis, Levitra, Staxyn and Stendra.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEdrugsonline.com is an online drug store that boasts about selling medications of highest quality. The drugs sold at the pharmacy are from all the licensed pharmacies in USA including names like Pfizer, gsk, MERCK and others. The website respects the customer privacy by keeping all the orders confidential. With discreet packaging, the medications are delivered at doorsteps. Edrugsonline.com has their own physicians, all licensed by the US government. The products available on the website are divided under the category of Men’s Health, Weight Loss, Sexual Health, Skin Care, Digestion, Personal Lubes, Allergies and Hairloss Treatments. Although there is a long list of medications available on the website, some of the best sellers include, Viagra, Cialis, Levitra, Staxyn and Stendra.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENot only does the website provides long list of approved medications, it also ensures that they are all available at the most affordable rates. For example 4 doses of Viagra 100mg costs $223, with per dose price of 55.75. 4 doses of Cialis costs $239, with per dose price of $59.75. Customers are also given a discount on buying more than 4 tablets.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ETo get in touch customers can call the pharmacy on the customers support center on different times during the entire week. An option of live chat is also available to get quick answers to your questions. Customers can also contact the pharmacy through email. Furthermore, the website is active on all social media networks including, Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and others. All products are shipped with in 48 hours through USPS and FedEx. The website accepts all major debit and credit cards.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEdrugsonline.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAlthough there were no customer feedback on the website, we did mange to find some reviews on other sources. The pharmacy buys from the authentic pharmaceutical companies from direct factories to make sure of the quality. It also sells sexual health drugs for both men and women. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003ESome of their popular listed products include Stacker 3 metabolizing fat which is available for only $13 instead of actual retail price of $31.99, NVE Pharmaceuticals stacker which is offered for only $13.70, etc. The prices are also often discounted for many products. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/canadamednet-com-reviews-a-risky-online-pharmacy-to-do-business-with\/","title":"Canadamednet.com Reviews – A Risky Online Pharmacy to Do Business With","url":"http:\/\/canadamednet.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Canadamednet.com-Review-880x320-1438832414.jpg","annotation":"Popular for selling prescription drugs, canadamednet.com is an online pharmacy selling quality prescription drugs to its customers all around the world. The consumers can choose from a wide variety of generic and brand name medicines that the website has to offer. Some of the popular meds include Wellbutrin XL (bupropion), Topamax generic (topiramate), Benicar (olmesarten), Plavix (clopidrogel) and others. The online drug store is known for selling medicines at extremely low price, providing their customers up to 80% discount on new prescriptions. The online pharmacy also sells Over the Counter drugs at extremely low rates. In case of any queries, the customers can call at a toll free number provided at on their homepage. Customers can also get in touch through fax number or directly through the email on website.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp\u003EPopular for selling prescription drugs, canadamednet.com is an online pharmacy selling quality prescription drugs to its customers all around the world. The consumers can choose from a wide variety of generic and brand name medicines that the website has to offer. Some of the popular meds include Wellbutrin XL (bupropion), Topamax generic (topiramate), Benicar (olmesarten), Plavix (clopidrogel) and others. The online drug store is known for selling medicines at extremely low price, providing their customers up to 80% discount on new prescriptions. The online pharmacy also sells Over the Counter drugs at extremely low rates. In case of any queries, the customers can call at a toll free number provided at on their homepage. Customers can also get in touch through fax number or directly through the email on website. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EDespite selling meds at low prices, canadamednet.com claims to sell medicines of highest quality. 90 tablets of Wellbutrin XL (300mg) are available at $200, whereas the market price is pretty close to $600. Likewise, Flomax generic 0.4 mg (100 capsules) are available for $80 only, giving customers a discount of over $250.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAlthough there is no return or exchange policy, the company does provide a full refund incase of damage or loss of package. Customers also get a refund if the right medicines aren’t delivered.  The online pharmacy accepts visa and master cards for payment. Customers can also pay through money orders or personal cheques.  \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ECanadamednet.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E As far as the customer reviews are concerned, there is not much available on the Internet. However, there were a few reviews here and there that didn’t have very good things to say about the online pharmacy. One of the customers said that it was hard for him to trust the website since it was not approved by the National Association of Boards of Pharmacy. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAccording to the customers, the disapproval of the pharmacy by the NABP puts a question mark on the safety of the medicines and credibility of the website. The customers also said that it was a high risk for their families to order medicines since they are unaware whether or not, the company is going to sell them expired medicines.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Canadamednet.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadamednet.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11305\u0022 \/\u003E\u003Cbr \/\u003E On the other hand, ratings from scam alert websites are also not in the favor of the online pharmacy. On Legit Script, the website is unapproved but not rogue, which is a more alarming pharmacy rating. Other scam alert websites also rated the online store low for trustworthiness and safety.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Canadamednet.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadamednet.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11304\u0022 \/\u003E \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EBased on their poor online reputation, the online pharmacy looks like a risk to do business. \u003C\/p\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ECanadamednet.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EDespite searching on Internet for a long time, we were unable to find any reviews regarding the online pharmacy. Even though, we did manage to find some reviews from the previous years, there was hardly any customer review this year. This could be an indication of the fact that the website is either out of service, or not making any sales at all. Judging by the previous reviews, the pharmacy wasn’t doing particularly well with the consumers, but we have to wait and see if it receives any reviews in the future.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ECanadamednet.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAs far as the discount coupons are concerned, there aren’t any offered by the pharmacy as yet. We couldn’t find any discount vouchers on the website or other sources. However, the company does offer great discounts when you make a purchase, especially on new prescriptions. The customers can enjoy up to 80% discount on the meds. For example, 100 tablets of Topamax generic (100mg) is sold by the online pharmacy for only $160, whereas its original price in the market is $724, providing the customers a discount of $560.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThe layout of the website is pretty simple. It may not be as user friendly as the other online pharmacies but it certainly provides the prices of the major meds on the front page, for the convenience of the customers. The customers have the facility to call the pharmacy free of charge if they have any questions regarding their order. Unfortunately, the customers doesn’t get any discount coupons from the website, but they certainly get to enjoy some great discounts on every purchase.  \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EOne major drawback of the website is it is not endorsed by NABP, which raises a lot of eyebrows on its credibility, but the website itself claims to be safe. As far as the website’s legitimacy is concerned, it is labeled as rogue on all scam alert websites. Considering all these factors in mind, canadamednet.com gets 2 stars out of 5 on the ratings. This definitely had an effect in reduced number of customers as lack of reviews this year indicates that the website is losing its once loyal customer base.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn the other hand, based on their previous feedback that was mix of positive and negative, it is more than evident that in last few years, once popular online pharmacy lost it touch. It was mentioned in a lot of reviews that the products were delivered on time. Some of the customers did not even have to pay for shipping due to light weight products. Also, almost all the shoppers were completely satisfied by the pricing of the products. The website was high recommended by the customers in a lot of reviews.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to positive customer feedback, the website is also not rated negatively on scam alert websites which makes it a safe option for customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EHbees.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe year 2015 saw no changes in the customer feedback. The same response was received by the website and yet again, fast shipping and affordable pricing were highly appreciated by the consumers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Hbees.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Hbees.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10984\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOne of the customers also mentioned that he was happy to have a wide range of choices in gluten-free food. Some of these coupons include:\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Hbees.com-Reviews2.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Hbees.com Reviews2\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022  class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10985\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECoupon Code. Almost all the major products are available on the home page with original and discounted prices. The website has over 3.7 thousand shares on different social media platforms which makes it an authority in the industry. The pricing is extremely low with no compromise on quality. The customer feedback about the website has mostly been very impressive. Customers have plenty of ways to communicate with the websites which makes it easier for them to inquire about any of the products. The online store uses prominent companies like FedEx, USPS and UPS to deliver its products and provides customers with plenty of payment options. As far as its legitimacy is concerned, the website is rated as rogue on the scam alert websites; however, keeping in mind the customer reviews, low pricing and fast shipping, the websites earns a total of 4 stars out of 5 on the ratings. There is every chance of the website receiving 5 stars in the future.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/www.hbees.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E4\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/antiaging-systems-reviews-a-quality-online-source-for-anti-aging-products\/","title":"Antiaging-systems Reviews – A Quality Online Source for Anti-Aging Products","url":"http:\/\/antiaging-systems.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Antiaging-systems.com-Review1-880x320-1437554460.jpg","annotation":"Antiaging Systems is part of a network of online pharmacies with other popular websites like www.antiaging-nootropics.com and www.antiaging-nutrition.com. There are quite a few services customers can find on the pharmacy website.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWegmans Pharmacy is a US based online pharmacy offering its services to the customers around the globe. Apart from medicines and refills, the website also offers food and grocery, nutrition and supplements and gift cards.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can create refill profiles and can order refills using Rx numbers and get store pickup. Some of them are as follows.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFree shipping: The pharmacy website also offers free home shipping to its customers as well. For example, Carefree Pantiliners are available for free after doubled coupon, originally sold for $0.99.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWegmans Pharmacy website offers prescription refills and free home shipping service to its members. Customers have shared a lot of positive reviews, but most of them are related to the stores and food available there. The company has also received few complaints showing that sales staff behaves poorly with them on few occasions. All in all the website is safe for customers, but they should be careful while picking up stores.
