The website offers to sell drugs manufactured by Canadian pharmacies along with cheaper alternatives from other countries like India.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBig Mountain Drugs is a licensed and approved Canadian based online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic and brand name drugs. The website claims to offer drugs at up to 90% discounted rates to Canadian customers and up to 50% discounted rated to elsewhere in North America. The online pharmacy is licensed by College of Pharmacists of BC and approved by Canadian International Pharmacy Association also known as CIPA. The website offers to sell drugs manufactured by Canadian pharmacies along with cheaper alternatives from other countries like India.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store offers drugs under wide range of categories. Some of their popular health categories include Acne Medicine, Anti-Malarial, Weight Loss, Skin Care, Eye Care, Sexual Health, ED drugs and more. The prices offered are also very low. For example, a popular drug Plavix is offered for only $30 while the retail price of the same drug is $49. Similarly, Lipitor is offered for $47 while the actual retail price is $89. Similar discounts are available on many other listed drugs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact their customer service through their toll free phone contact or email at any time of the day. Customers can pay through MasterCard and Visa credit cards for their orders. The head office of the online pharmacy is situated in Surrey, BC Canada.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBigmountaindrugs.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe customer feedback and reviews are above average with few displeased customers but there are no serious complaints reported like financial loss or fraud. But another customer Robert, who reviewed the website on 25\u003Csup\u003Eth\u003C\/sup\u003EJanuary, 2015 claimed that he is buying from the website for last 5 years without any problem. According to him, the website acts like a discount pharmacy and required prescription. According to the customer, their generics are form the largest generic manufacturer in the world, TEVA which is SA based pharmaceutical company.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Bigmountaindrugs.com-Reviews3.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Bigmountaindrugs.com Reviews3\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10956\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is also approved by PharamcyChecker.com as it is licensed and Canadian based online store. The status was last verified by the Pharmacy Checker on 22\u003Csup\u003End\u003C\/sup\u003E June, 2015. According to the website, the website is licensed by College of Pharmacists of British Columbia with a license number V24.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy is a genuine online option for customers in North America looking to buy affordable medicines. Even though, customer feedback is average about their services but the online pharmacy is based in North America with active license which makes it less risky and legal option to but from.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBigmountaindrugs.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their low cost medicines, the website also offers limited number of special offers and deals to allows customers to safe more. Some of their popular special offers are listed below.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003E5% Discount on Rewards Program. The online pharmacy offers a reward program by forwarding the 5% amount of all your purchases to your next order. You can get 5% discount on every order based on your previous purchase.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EDaily Specials. The website also offers daily deals under their “Today’s Big Mountain Special” offer in which multiple random drugs are sold for discounted prices.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECoupon codes are not available on any third party coupon website but customers can check back later for active coupon codes.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is well designed and simple to use. Customer feedback is mix of positive and negative but without any serious issues related to financial loss. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/pill-doctor-reviews-the-old-pharmacy-redirecting-to-new-website-that-is-also-not-working\/","title":"Pill-doctor Reviews – The Old Pharmacy Redirecting to New Website that is Also Not Working","url":"http:\/\/pill-doctor.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Pill-doctor.com-Review-880x320-1437554166.jpg","annotation":"Pill-doctor.com is an online pharmacy that sells generic and brand name drugs to their customers. The website is currently redirecting all of their customers to the new upgraded online store, managecarecost.com which is also currently down. The online store sells wide range of generics and brand name drugs as well as employs a network of certified pharmacists and physicians who evaluate every order before approving orders for better customer protection. The online store sells drugs under wide range of health conditions which includes allergy, arthritis, digestive health, cholesterol control, anti-fungal, antidepressants, birth control, sexual health, weight loss, skin care and many more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPill-doctor.com is an online pharmacy that sells generic and brand name drugs to their customers. The online store sells wide range of generics and brand name drugs as well as employs a network of certified pharmacists and physicians who evaluate every order before approving orders for better customer protection. The online store sells drugs under wide range of health conditions which includes allergy, arthritis, digestive health, cholesterol control, anti-fungal, antidepressants, birth control, sexual health, weight loss, skin care and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their wide range of drugs, the prices offered by the online store are also very competitive. Another popular pain relief drug, tramadol is offered for only $140.79 for a packet of 30 pills. The prices are mostly less than what are offered at retail price on local North American pharmacies. For all orders, prescription is not required but pharmacy may ask for the prescription if find necessary.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website offers overnight shipment within North America. Customers are also confused now as the website redirects to the new website which is also down right now.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Pill-doctor.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Pill-doctor.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022776\u0022 height=\u0022102\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10941\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than the absence of genuine customer feedback, the online pharmacy enjoys poor reputation on scam alert websites. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/safe-online-pharmacy-reviews-most-affordable-option-for-generics-ed-but-suspicious\/","title":"Safe-online-pharmacy Reviews – Most Affordable Option for Generics ED but Suspicious","url":"http:\/\/safe-online-pharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Safe-online-pharmacy.com-Review-880x320-1431705578.jpg","annotation":"Safe Online Pharmacy is a 7 years old online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs to their worldwide customers. Their best selling products are generic ED drugs like Vaigra, Cialis, Kamagra and more but customers can also find other drugs under different product categories like Allergies, Depression, Hair Loss, Pain Relief, Weight Loss, Women’s Health and many more. All of their listed generics are manufactured at Indian pharmacies and approved by Indian FDA.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESafe Online Pharmacy is a 7 years old online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs to their worldwide customers. Their best selling products are generic ED drugs like Vaigra, Cialis, Kamagra and more but customers can also find other drugs under different product categories like Allergies, Depression, Hair Loss, Pain Relief, Weight Loss, Women’s Health and many more. All of their listed generics are manufactured at Indian pharmacies and approved by Indian FDA.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the online pharmacy are lowest customers can find anywhere on the internet. Generic Viagra is available for only $0.44 per pill that is almost half the price of actual wholesale price. Generic Viagra is mostly sold at $1.1 to $0.67 at other online pharmacies that makes safe-online-pharmacy one of the cheapest online source for generic ED pills. Similarly, Cialis is available for only $0.91 per pill.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact their support through their phone numbers, email and online form. Payment options are currently limited to only visa credit cards. The website offers free reshipment or refund of money in case of lost shipment. The website claims to be approved by CIPA (Certified Canadian International Pharmacy), CPA and MIPA.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESafe-online-pharmacy.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback and online reviews are not available anywhere on the internet. This indicates that the online pharmacy is not popular among customers and not many people are buying from them to share their experiences. The only form of online feedback is available in the form of testimonials posted on their own website. But the similar testimonials are available on few other online pharmacies which show that the online pharmacy is a part of a network that is using the same set of testimonials on all of their websites. This makes this testimonials unreliable and unworthy to base our rating on.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Safe-online-pharmacy.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Safe-online-pharmacy.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10745\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll of the listed reviews are just a note of thanks about delivered orders without much value and feedback about their quality, customer service and other services.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to lack of reviews, trust rating from scam alert websites is also very low that makes them very risky website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Safe-online-pharmacy.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Safe-online-pharmacy.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10746\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store is also listed as rogue pharmacy by legitscript.com for not meeting the online pharmacy verification standards. All in all, the online reputation is not good which shows that customers need to avoid this online pharmacy if they value their health and money.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESafe-online-pharmacy.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EJust like previous years, the feedback from customers is not available in 2015. Trust rating is still low while the status as rogue pharmacy is still valid. Until and unless we read some genuine feedback from customers, the website is considered suspicious and risk for health and money.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy is not recommended even when they claim to be a Certified Canadian International Pharmacy.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESafe-online-pharmacy.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their rock bottom prices, the website also offers pocket full of other discounts to help customers save more. Some of their popular deals are listed below.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Shipping. The online store offers free airmail shipping on all orders above $200 and free courier shipping for all orders above $300.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EED Trial Packs. Customers can buy ED trial packs on discounted priced which allows them to try different variety of ED drugs like Viagra, Cialis and Levitra without paying separately for them.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree ED Pills. The products are also only Indian FDA approved and delivered directly from India without going through a check from US FDA or other authorities that makes them unsafe for health. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/reliable-canadian-pharmacy-reviews-low-prices-but-risky-online-store\/","title":"Reliable Canadian Pharmacy Reviews – Low Prices but Risky Online Store","url":"http:\/\/reliablecanadianpharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Reliablecanadianpharmacy.com-Review-880x320-1431704227.jpg","annotation":"Reliable Canadian Pharmacy is a Canadian based online pharmacy which promises customers to offer generic products that can help them save up to 80% on their medications. The licensed online pharmacy caters to the needs of Canadian as well as customers from United States, Europe and other countries. The online store offers both prescription and over the counter drugs. Even though, the online store features sexual health drugs as their main products but customers can also buy other products listed under different categories like Anti Depressant, Eye Care, ED, Diabetes, Weight Loss, Hypertension and many more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EReliable Canadian Pharmacy is a Canadian based online pharmacy which promises customers to offer generic products that can help them save up to 80% on their medications. The licensed online pharmacy caters to the needs of Canadian as well as customers from United States, Europe and other countries. The online store offers both prescription and over the counter drugs. Even though, the online store features sexual health drugs as their main products but customers can also buy other products listed under different categories like Anti Depressant, Eye Care, ED, Diabetes, Weight Loss, Hypertension and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website also offers very attractive and affordable prices on their products. The online store offers a popular ED drug, generic Levitra for as low as $0.80 per pill for an order of 200 pills. Similarly, the online store also offers generic Cialis for only $1.73 per pill. The website also offers complete details about each product with precautions and side effects.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact the support and customer service through toll free phone contact and email. Payment options include Visa credit cards and e-check. The online store also delivers orders to their worldwide customers. The online pharmacy offers standard shipping for $9.99 on all orders. Even though, the website provides link to their social media channels but accounts are inactive.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EReliablecanadianpharmacy.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback about the online pharmacy is very limited. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/rightsourcerx-reviews-a-genuine-online-service-but-with-negative-online-reputation\/","title":"Rightsourcerx Reviews – A Genuine Online Service but with Negative Online Reputation","url":"http:\/\/rightsourcerx.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Rightsourcerx.com-Review-880x320-1431704948.jpg","annotation":"RightSource is a US based online pharmacy and an online prescription service that allows users to consult a pharmacist online and can get their prescribed drugs at their footsteps without going to pharmacy. The online pharmacy offers both specialty and maintenance medicines to their customers.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERightSource is a US based online pharmacy and an online prescription service that allows users to consult a pharmacist online and can get their prescribed drugs at their footsteps without going to pharmacy. The online pharmacy offers both specialty and maintenance medicines to their customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy works in few simple steps. Customers can fill their prescription online using a form after signing up with the online service. The website will create an online profile of the user with a trackable id for user’s order. In the following step, a pharmacist checks the prescription to see if the drugs are according to your health profile. After approval, the order is processed and forwarded to pharmacy where it is checked again by another pharmacist for accuracy of shipped drugs and user’s prescription. After state-of-the art bottle protection and packaging, the drugs are shipped to the desired address of the customer.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ETo learn more about their services, customers can call their US and Canada based numbers. The service is currently limited to North America only. The online store currently help customers shop for prescriptions related to skin care, women’s health, personal care, digestive health, allergy and sinus, diabetes supplies and many more. Customers can pay for their monthly membership according to their needs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERightsourcerx.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is available in bulk which means many customers are using their services, but the online reputation is below average. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/canadian-pharmacy-king-reviews-great-options-and-prices-but-doubtful-pharmacy\/","title":"Canadian Pharmacy King Reviews – Great Options and Prices but Doubtful Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/canadianpharmacyking.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Canadianpharmacyking.com-Review-880x320-1431701613.jpg","annotation":"Canadian Pharmacy King is a Canadian based online pharmacy that sells affordable generic and brand name drugs to the customers. The online pharmacy is accredited member of the Canadian International Pharmacy Association (CIPA) as well as verified from Pharmacy Checker. The online store has sold medicines to more than 200,000 customers since 2003 and working in the pharmacy industry for last 12 years. The online store sells drugs under different product categories that include Antidepressants, Arthritis, Anti Inflammatory, Asthma, Birth Control, Blood Pressure, Eye Care, Men’s Health, Women’s Health and more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadian Pharmacy King is a Canadian based online pharmacy that sells affordable generic and brand name drugs to the customers. The online pharmacy is accredited member of the Canadian International Pharmacy Association (CIPA) as well as verified from Pharmacy Checker. The online store has sold medicines to more than 200,000 customers since 2003 and working in the pharmacy industry for last 12 years. The online store sells drugs under different product categories that include Antidepressants, Arthritis, Anti Inflammatory, Asthma, Birth Control, Blood Pressure, Eye Care, Men’s Health, Women’s Health and more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than their wide options of listed medicines, the prices offered by the online pharmacy are also very affordable and in some cases, rock bottom. For example, generic Cialis is sold for $25 per 30 pills that makes one pill less than $1. The brand name Cialis is available for $273 per 28 pills that reflects the huge price difference between generic and brand name versions.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact their support through their toll free phone contact and email. The head office of the pharmacy is located at Surrey, Vancouver. The online store needs a valid prescription to process an order but over-the-counter products are available without prescription. The online pharmacy currently ships to only Canada, United States, United Kingdom, Turkey, Singapore, New Zealand and Mauritius. Shipping rate is fixed at $10 that takes 10 to 18 days. The online store currently accepts only checks and money orders.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadianpharmacyking.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOnline feedback and customer feedback is limited for the Canadian Pharmacy King. He adds that the effects he felt after taking kamagra were good, a slight breathing, hard heart rate, significant reduction in blood pressure and swelling plus a good feeling between the legs. He loved kamagra so much that he recommended it to his friends.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe reviews are mostly complimentary especially of the kamagra products. All the users enjoyed the feeling that came with taking the pill. And the price of the kamagra was very reasonable.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EKamagra.nl Coupon Codes\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E30% is offered to all orders made. This is a great save for the website’s clients. Apart from this discount offer, the company offers combo packs which are packs of a combination of various kamagra products. Some of the combo packs are:\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EKamagra combo pack of one strip and one strip kamagra goes for £17,50\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECombination of 1 strip kamagra and kamagra oral jelly,1 box costs £25,00\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EComo pack containing 2strips and 1 box of Kamagra oral jell goes for £32,00\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECombination of 5 strips kamagra and kamagra Oral jelly,2 boxes at £69,99\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThose are the only special offers provided by the website. They could add some more deals to have more customers purchasing kamagra products. Because the website already has plenty of people who prefer their kamagra products to Viagra, they can use this to their advantage by encouraging discount deals rewarded to their clients for referring the website to family and friends.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EConclusion\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWith 68% trust score, the website is fairly safe to use. Although people can use the website without fear of malware distribution, the website has a few downsides that people should consider before engaging in any activity with it. The website’s location is said to be possibly two countries, Malta and the Netherlands. A thorough research should be carried out to verify the details provided by the company are genuine. The website was listed as a rogue pharmacy which means the website might have been involved in breaking federal, state of FDA laws. Also they might have also been involved in some fraudulent activities. The website gets 2 stars.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/kamagra.nl\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. In 2015, Walgreens pharmacy launched a new online tool that will help customers to design weekly plan to stay fit and healthy.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe company offers prescription refills online. Customers can order refills from their accounts, they can chose give RX refill number, and manage their auto refills. Other than refills, there are other pharmacy services including pharmacy chat, family prescription, reminders for Rx refills, medication compounding and much more. Customers can also see their health dashboard, check appointments, visit healthcare clinics, and find other information related to their health.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy offers a wide range of products divided into different categories. Some of the categories include persona care, beauty, medication and treatments, diet and fitness, natural and organic supplements and more. The online pharmacy offers health products at affordable prices. For example, Wal-zyr 10mg tablets pack is available for $19.99 with $12 discount.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy accepts payment via credit card, debit card, Discover Network, American Express, PayPal and BillMeLater. The pharmacy offers standard and expedited shipping and customers can get free shipping on order $20 or more. Even though, the doctor called and verified the prescription, the store did not cooperate with the customer.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10849\u0022 src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Walgreens-Pharmacy-Reviews-20152.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Walgreens Pharmacy Reviews 20152\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn the other hand, one of the satisfied customers said Walgreens has the best pharmacists. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/secure-canadian-pharmacy-reviews-lowest-possible-generic-prices-but-suspicious-online-pharmacy\/","title":"Secure-canadian-pharmacy Reviews – Lowest Possible Generic Prices but Suspicious Online Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/secure-canadian-pharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/noscreen2-880x320-1432101251.png","annotation":"Secure-canadian-pharmacy.com is one of the domains used by “Online Pharmacy” that sells generic and brand name drugs to their worldwide customers. Use of multiple domains like safe-online-pharmacy.com which represents the same online pharmacy indicates that it is operated by the same network that operates from Eastern Europe. The online pharmacy claims to be approved by CIPA (Certified Canadian International Pharmacy), CPA and MIPA.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESecure-canadian-pharmacy.com is one of the domains used by “Online Pharmacy” that sells generic and brand name drugs to their worldwide customers. Use of multiple domains like safe-online-pharmacy.com which represents the same online pharmacy indicates that it is operated by the same network that operates from Eastern Europe. The online pharmacy claims to be approved by CIPA (Certified Canadian International Pharmacy), CPA and MIPA.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ETheir best selling and featured products are generic ED drugs like Vaigra, Cialis, Levitra and more but customers can also find other drugs under different product categories like Allergies, Depression, Hair Loss, Pain Relief, Weight Loss, Women’s Health and many more. All of their listed generics are manufactured at licensed Indian pharmacies and approved by Indian FDA before shipment.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the online pharmacy are lowest customers can find anywhere on the internet. Generic Viagra is available for only $0.44 per pill that is almost half the price of actual wholesale price. Generic Viagra is mostly sold at $1.1 to $0.67 at other online pharmacies that makes safe-online-pharmacy one of the cheapest online source for generic ED pills. Similarly, Cialis is available for only $0.91 per pill. Customers can contact their support through their phone numbers, email and online form. Payment options are currently limited to only visa credit cards. The website offers free reshipment or refund of money in case of lost shipment.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESecure-canadian-pharmacy.com Review\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback and online reviews are difficult to find anywhere on the internet. For an online store that claims to be in business for last 7 years, lack of customer reviews on independent sources indicates that not many people are buying from the store. The feedback is available only in the form of testimonials posted on their own website that are moderated for content so they cannot be trusted. On the other hand, the same set of testimonials are posted on few other similar online pharmacies which indicates that the same web content is used on multiple websites operated by same network working from Eastern Europe, a place known for hosting scam websites. This makes the testimonials unreliable as well as makes the online store suspicious.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Secure-canadian-pharmacy.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Secure-canadian-pharmacy.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10833\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe fact that the online store uses different domain names for same website also indicates that the online pharmacy is suspicious as most websites switch domain names when they are blacklisted by authorities. All the listed generics are approved by Indian FDA and manufactured by licensed Indian based pharmacies. All the orders are also shipped directly from India. Some of their popular product categories beside their featured ED and Sexual Health products are Alcoholism, Arthritis, Eye Care, Skin Care, Weight Loss, Women’s Health and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered for their generics are also rock bottom if compared to other similar online pharmacies. Generic Viagra is available for only $0.69 pr pill that is cheaper than the actual wholesale price. Generic Levitra is offered for only $1.50 per pill while generic Amoxil is available for only $0.44.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe content of website is similar to many other online pharmacies which indicate that the online pharmacy is a part of network that is operated from Russia. Customer service is reachable through phone contacts, email and live chat. Customers can choose between Express International Mail and Standard International Airmail as shipping method. The first one costs $30 and delivers within 5 to 9 days with tracking id to track order online. Customers can pay through all popular credit cards.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERx-med.net Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback is not available on any of the review website and forums. The only form of the feedback is testimonials that are posted on their own website. The same testimonials are posted on many other similar websites that are operated by one network that operates from Russia. Most of the websites and online pharmacies operated by this network are fake and scams that makes these testimonials useless to base our rating on.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe testimonials are all positive, but as they are the same set of testimonials used on at last 10 more websites, the genuineness of these testimonials seems untrue.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Rx-med.net-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Rx-med.net Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10825\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe domain is still just 7 months old, the reason scam alert and other websites provide inconclusive trust rating about them but rate them suspicious due to their young age and their operation from Russia that is often rated as high risk country for online pharmacies as lot of fake\/fraudulent pharmacies work from Russia and Eastern Europe.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, the online reputation of the website is not good beside the fact that it is only 7 months old. The online store also offers additional Viagra pills with every order as bonus. Customers can have 4 extra pills on the order of 20 ED pills, 10 bonus pills on the order of 60 Viagra pills. 20 free bonus pills on the order of 100 or more ED or generic Priligy pills.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Shipping. The online store offers free shipping through standard airmail shipping on all orders worth more than $150.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EDiscounts for Return Customers. Customer’s feedback is also not available whole scam alert websites also rated it below average for trustworthiness. They also offer photo products and services like photo books, gifts, motion products, calendars and more. The online store also represents number of stores situated in different cities of United States.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy allows customers to chat with the pharmacist online to discuss their health condition and prescription. They offer multiple other services like RX Reminders, Get Immunized, Transfer a prescription, Refill a Prescription, RediClinic and many more online services to provide convenience to customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact their support through their live chat option, phone contact, email and their social media platforms. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/rxdownunder-reviews-new-website-but-listed-as-rogue-pharmacy\/","title":"Rxdownunder Reviews – New Website but Listed as Rogue Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/rxdownunder.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Rxdownunder.com-Review-880x320-1432051169.jpg","annotation":"Rxdownunder.com is a domain name that represents Online Pharmacy Australia that sells generic and brand name drugs to their customers in Australia, Asia and South-Pacific region. The generics listed on their website are all manufactured at licensed Indian pharmacies that are also FDA approved. The orders are also shipped directly from India after going through quality check. Their featured and best selling drugs are all related to ED and Sexual Health but customers can find range of other product categories on their homepage. Some of their other popular product categories include Blood Pressure, Asthma, hair Loss, Hormones, Pain Relief, Quit Smoking, etc.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERxdownunder.com is a domain name that represents Online Pharmacy Australia that sells generic and brand name drugs to their customers in Australia, Asia and South-Pacific region. The generics listed on their website are all manufactured at licensed Indian pharmacies that are also FDA approved. The orders are also shipped directly from India after going through quality check. Their featured and best selling drugs are all related to ED and Sexual Health but customers can find range of other product categories on their homepage. Some of their other popular product categories include Blood Pressure, Asthma, hair Loss, Hormones, Pain Relief, Quit Smoking, etc.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than their wide product range, the online store also offers rock bottom prices that are hard to match by other online pharmacies. For example, Viagra is available for only $0.75 that is cheaper than retail price but there are few other online sources where you can find Viagra for as low as $0.69 per pill. Similarly, Cialis is available for $1.07 per pill while Levitra is available for $1.79 per pill.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store offers 5 different shipping options for customers to choose from. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/canadian-online-drugs-reviews-a-risky-website-rated-as-scam\/","title":"Canadian Online Drugs Reviews – A Risky Website Rated as Scam","url":"http:\/\/canadianonlinedrugs.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Canadianonlinedrugs.com-Review-880x320-1431656299.jpg","annotation":"Canadian Online Drugs or Canadian Drug Store is an online store based in Canada that sells generic and brand name versions of a wide range of drugs. The three year old pharmacy offers ED and Sexual Health drugs as their featured products but customers can also shop under different other health conditions like Allergy, Cardiovascular, Eye Care, Skin Care, Weight Loss, Urinary Tract, Pain Medicine and many more. All the drugs are approved and verified by India FDA and delivered to customers through licensed Indian manufacturers.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadian Online Drugs or Canadian Drug Store is an online store based in Canada that sells generic and brand name versions of a wide range of drugs. The three year old pharmacy offers ED and Sexual Health drugs as their featured products but customers can also shop under different other health conditions like Allergy, Cardiovascular, Eye Care, Skin Care, Weight Loss, Urinary Tract, Pain Medicine and many more. All the drugs are approved and verified by India FDA and delivered to customers through licensed Indian manufacturers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their wide product options, the prices listed are also very competitive but not the lowest available on online pharmacies. For example, generic Viagra is available for just $1.05 per pill but few online pharmacies are selling generic Viagra for as low as $0.56. Generic Cialis is available for just $1.68 per pill that may be lower than retail price but cheaper online options are also available. On the other hand, the website offers 10% discount on the price offered by any other online pharmacy.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store offers 24\/7 customer service through their two North American and Europe based phone contacts, emails and email order. Available payment options include Visa, American Express and MasterCard credit cards. Shipping is available in every country and takes 14 to 21 business days based on the type of shipping method selected. Online tracking is available which allows customer to keep track of their ordered package.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadianonlinedrugs.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online reputation of Canadian Online Drugs is very poor. Not only they lack genuine customer feedback that is very limited, but the available online reviews are all negative with a very low trust rating and warnings from scam alert websites. The only form of positive feedback is in the form of testimonials available on their own website with a questionable authenticity as they are moderated by the staff. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/pharmacists-reviews-canadian-pharmacists-association-offering-benefits-to-pharmacists-for-low-membership-fees\/","title":"Pharmacists Reviews – Canadian Pharmacists Association Offering Benefits to Pharmacists for Low Membership Fees","url":"http:\/\/pharmacists.ca","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmacists.ca-Review-880x320-1431657152.jpg","annotation":"Pharmacits.ca is a website that represents Canadian Pharmacists Association (CPhA) online. The Canadian association is a non-profit organization established in 1907 to provide pharmacists with information, tools and other resources to help them focus on better patient care. The association claims to be the national voice for Canadian pharmacists. The goal and mission of the association is to advance well-being and health of Canadians through excellence and betterment in pharmacist care. The website also offers limited number of drug \u0026amp; therapeutic products for their members which include compendium of products for minor ailments, compendium of therapeutic choices, e-Therapeutics+ and many more. The e-suit of CPS is also available at an affordable price of $349.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacits.ca is a website that represents Canadian Pharmacists Association (CPhA) online. The Canadian association is a non-profit organization established in 1907 to provide pharmacists with information, tools and other resources to help them focus on better patient care. The association claims to be the national voice for Canadian pharmacists. The goal and mission of the association is to advance well-being and health of Canadians through excellence and betterment in pharmacist care. The website also offers limited number of drug \u0026amp; therapeutic products for their members which include compendium of products for minor ailments, compendium of therapeutic choices, e-Therapeutics+ and many more. The e-suit of CPS is also available at an affordable price of $349.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadian Pharmacists Association also offers reference services, education services and organizes events for its members. Among its education services, the association offers skill development courses in lab tests, patient care, medication review services, diabetes tools and practice and smoking cessation programs. Members may also have an access to therapeutic content and other integrated solutions on the website. Apart from these products and services, the association also provides practice tools, professional development programs and critical information necessary for pharmacists or for those who are interested in pharmacy business.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EInterested people can contact via call, fax or send an email or post a letter to the association. The association allows pharmacists and pharmacy companies to enjoy their membership for only $25 per member.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacists.ca Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the online store represents an association instead of an online pharmacy, the customer feedback is not available as there are not many customers and target audience is very limited that is pharmacists only. But the feedback from their members is also not available anywhere on the internet. The limited number of products offered on their store is available at affordable price as well as their membership also looks affordable but till now, none of their members have shared their experiences on the review websites or forums.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, the association is a legal non-profit organization with some attractive perks for their members for a low price of $25 as membership fees that makes them a must try for pharmacists.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacists.ca Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EJust like previous years, feedback is also not available in 2014 and 2015 as it is not a store but an association even though there is limited number of products offered to their members.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacists.ca Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the online store does sell limited number of products to their members, deals and special discounts are not available but range of special bonuses offered against membership are provided to members. Some are listed below.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EDiscounts on Special Programs. The website offers Significant discounts on national conferences and continuing education programs registration rates. For example, members can save $300 on CPhA’s new lab values course, $200 on QUIT smoking cessation and $600 on ADAPT.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree CEUs. The members are also allowed to earn free CEUs with CPhA’s e-Therapeutics Highlights CE that worth up to 13 CEUs per year.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EDiscount on Canadian Pharmacists Journal. Members can buy 6 bi-monthly issues and online subscription of the Canadian Pharmacists Journal for only $10 instead of $125.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFeatures for Pharmacies. The website offers special access to member pharmacies to practical practice tools and resources to help improve workflow and productivity. The online association also offers members an access to national and international research and reports.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website of the Canadian Pharmacists is well designed with useful information and features for its members. The association also offers wide range of perks to its members in addition to useful but limited tools and products. The membership is also very affordable that is only $25 per member. The only drawback is lack of reviews. All in all, the website deserves 4 out of 5 rating.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/pharmacists.ca\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E4\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/canadian-healthcare-network-reviews-it-may-help-medical-experts-with-latest-medical-information\/","title":"Canadian Healthcare Network Reviews – It May Help Medical Experts with Latest Medical Information","url":"http:\/\/canadianhealthcarenetwork.ca","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Canadianhealthcarenetwork.ca-Review-880x320-1431655353.jpg","annotation":"Canadian Healthcare Netowork is an online destination for professionals to learn and increase their medical knowledge. Creates in 2009, this website is limited for doctors, nurses, drug suppliers, pharmacists and healthcare managers, offering free membership and giving access to a large medical database. The online platform offers news, articles and documents for extra information. The website is created by Rogers Publishing Healthcare Group.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadian Healthcare Netowork is an online destination for professionals to learn and increase their medical knowledge. Creates in 2009, this website is limited for doctors, nurses, drug suppliers, pharmacists and healthcare managers, offering free membership and giving access to a large medical database. The online platform offers news, articles and documents for extra information. The website is created by Rogers Publishing Healthcare Group.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can only access to limited information if they opt to navigate the website as unregistered readers. They can get access to FAQ section where they can find helpful tips to on becoming a member\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFor those falling in above mentioned criteria can register themselves by opting for the profession they belonged, and get access to topics related to their profession.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFor those who want to contact the website staff, they can contact via phone and email. As there is nothing to sell, payment methods and options are not offered by the website. In order to find the eligibility of information, readers can contact representatives of respective departments to resolve their concerns.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadianhealthcarenetwork.ca Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews are vital for website success because they show how frequently the website is being used. As mentioned earlier, Canadian Healthcare Network is just a source of information for limited number of people who are related to medical field, there is nothing for patients in it. This is the reason why the online source doesn’t have any customer reviews.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EHowever, we continued the process of checking the website on scam alert websites, just to make sure if it was a scam.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Canadianhealthcarenetwork.ca-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadianhealthcarenetwork.ca Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10694\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWe found that the Medical information provider has not been listed on Legitscript.com. On the other hand, another scam alert website indicated that Canadian Healthcare Network has trustworthiness, because the content on the website is not harmful by any means.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadianhealthcarenetwork.ca Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online Canada based medical information source is only for medical professionals. The website hasn’t got any negative or positive reviews from the customers in the year 2014 and 2015. Surprisingly, none of the doctors, nurses, pharmacists or physicians have given their reviews regarding the authenticity of the website, either. This is one negative factor that can put the website in a little bit of doubt. However, as the content of the website is not directly related to patient’s safety, we can ignore the fact that the website lacks any support or criticism.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadianhealthcarenetwork.ca Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs Canadian Healthcare Network does not sell medicines and drugs, there is no question of getting discounts and deals. One thing customers can get is a free membership, and access to a large network of doctors and medical practitioners.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadian Healthcare Network is a source of information only for doctors, healthcare managers, pharmacists, nurses and physicians. The online source of medical information offers latest news and articles and give learning opportunities to its members only. The security of content has been of prime importance, which is why no one can gave access to the content unless he registers himself with the website. On the basis of little pieces of information available on the homepage, we conclude that the website is a good source of information. But as it is not for online patients, we rate it 3 out of 5.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/canadianhealthcarenetwork.ca\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E3\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The company claims to follow Drugs and Cosmetics Act of India 1940.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E“NoPrescription Online Pharmacy” is a place to find generic medications online. The company claims to follow Drugs and Cosmetics Act of India 1940.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe range of medicines is quite large, customers can find medicines for almost every health issue. Some of the medicines include anti-allergies, anti-viral, antibiotics, migraine treatment, obesity treatment, cancer medicines, diabetic medicines, ED medicines and many others. ED pills have been the top selling products on the website, with generic Viagra being no.1 product. The online pharmacy makes sure customers get low prices and high quality generic products. For example, a pill of generic Viagra is available for as low as $0.69. Other than low prices, customers can get more discounts on the website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy provides order tracking facility to its customers. For long and detailed queries, customers can send email directly to the company, or they can forward their queries through online support form available on the website. Shipping takes 10 – 17 days. The company also refunds the whole amount if the customers are not satisfied and intends to return it.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENoprescription-online-pharmacy.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E“NoPrescription Online Pharmacy” may be in the business for 9 years or more, it hasn’t been able to get any positive customer reviews. The independent review and scam alert report make the pharmacy website less reliable.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENoprescription-online-pharmacy.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENormally, businesses face trouble during early stages and become stable with the passage of time. That could be the case with this Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com well. Therefore, we tried to investigate further in order to find latest customer reviews, a good review would definitely help. However, the search was wasted as the website doesn’t show any improvement. In fact, SiteJabbar indicated that this online pharmacy never responded to any bad customer review. This makes it more certain that Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com is not meant for fair business.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENoprescription-online-pharmacy.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy has a lot of products at highly affordable prices. To attract more customers, the website offers many other things, as mentioned below:\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Pills: Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com offers free pills with specific orders. Customers can get as many as 20 Viagra pills with their purchases.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EDiscounts: The online pharmacy offers 5% discounts to those customers who order for the second time. Customers ordering for the third time are entitled to receive 7% discount on their orders. Moreover, customers who told their friends about the website will receive up to 10% discount on their purchases.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Shipping: The online pharmacy also offers free shipping on specific orders. Customers can avail free standard shipping on orders over $150.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECoupon codes and other special deals are not available at the moment. Interested customers may talk to the representatives and get updates of discounts to come in near future.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWith all exciting promotions, engaging deals and attractive prices Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com appears to be a great website, but wait. The online pharmacy has not been able to receive any positive independent customer review except for one eye opener. Scam alert websites have indicated that Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com has unlawful practices and customers should stay away from it. Based on our finding, customers are advised not to trust the website. The pharmacy website receives 1 out of 5 rating.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/noprescription-online-pharmacy.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E1\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The website was created in 2007 with the purpose of giving insights on a wide range of health disorders, their symptoms, causes and remedies. Customers from around the world can benefit from the website by learning about the diseases they carry and find the right remedies for them.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENmihi is an online health guide that serves customer with Utopia of information on diseases and health disorders. Customers from around the world can benefit from the website by learning about the diseases they carry and find the right remedies for them.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENmihi offers a collection of more than 500 articles on health issues including pain and arthritis, nutrition and food, digestive health, cold and flu, skincare, weight and obesity issues and many others. For example, Zithromax is one of the few medicines that treats a disease called bacterial endocarditis. The medicine can be bought from as many as 12 registered pharmacies that offers different prices. 30 pills of Zithromax 250 mg can be bought at $1.73 per pill.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll health issues and their remedies are displayed in alphabetical order, allowing customers to get every information they could possibly get. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/mypharmacyconnect-reviews-a-service-that-connects-patients-and-reliable-pharmacies\/","title":"Mypharmacyconnect Reviews – A Service That Connects Patients and Reliable Pharmacies","url":"http:\/\/mypharmacyconnect.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Mypharmacyconnect.com-Review-880x320-1431060645.jpg","annotation":"MyPharmacyConnect isn’t an online pharmacy to buy medicines. The US based website, that was created three years ago, is actually a service designed to provide easy access for customers to online pharmacies. It enables patients to connect with their pharmacies at their own schedule. It’s an app that allows patients to take care of their health.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMyPharmacyConnect isn’t an online pharmacy to buy medicines. The US based website, that was created three years ago, is actually a service designed to provide easy access for customers to online pharmacies. It enables patients to connect with their pharmacies at their own schedule. It’s an app that allows patients to take care of their health.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMyPharmacyConnect offers help in keeping up with health issues. Patients can sign up with this app and update their medical history online. The pharmacy service provider keeps all information confidential. All information is provided to the pharmacy of customers’ choice. The website allows patients to set reminders and alerts for medical examination and doctor appointments. It also helps keep track of refill prescription.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can also link their family members to their account so that a reminder can alert them of refills and doctor’s appointments. On behalf of the customer, myPharmacyConnect sends auto reminders to the concerned pharmacy. This feature is applied on regular refills.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMyPharmacyConnect helps save time customer waste to get their refills. The app has a Prescription Ready notification that updates a customer when his prescription is ready to be picked. In case, is customer forgets to pick any of his prescriptions, myPharmacyConnect sends an alert to him. Members will receive heldesk support to rectify problems in their profiles and account.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn the other hand, pharmacists can also register on the website and increase their availability. As a result, they can grow sales and expand their business.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMypharmacyconnect.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe US based website has a few customer reviews available in its testimonials. The reviews have been submitted by the users and pharmacists alike and all have been in favor of the website. According to pharmacies, the website is a good help to increase their customers, especially when there are too many fake pharmacies around.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to Kip C, the pharmacy gets 25% daily refills through myPharmacyConnect According to Don A. myPharmacyConnect is quite helpful and convenient as customers can get their refills on time and they don’t have to spend time waiting for their refills. According to Sam H, a pharmacists, mPC has helped them reduce their return to stock levels by 50%.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Mypharmacyconnect.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Mypharmacyconnect.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10551\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to Emily H. the website is quite easy to use. The process of registration and getting refills is quite easy and time saving for the customer.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Mypharmacyconnect.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Mypharmacyconnect.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10552\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn independent review sites, there hasn’t been any praises and complaints regarding myPharmacyConnect. While one might think that the website could use customer’s information to deceive them, but none of the incident has been reported ever since it was established. In order to get more about the website, scam alert reports are the best source. According to scam alert website, there is nothing doubtful about myPharmacyConnect and it looks quite popular among customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMypharmacyconnect.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs there are no independent customer reviews available on the internet, we cannot say whether the reviews available on myPharmacyConnect were submitted in 2014 or before that. However, the latest report from scam alert website indicated that the medical service has unknown trustworthiness. Here, it is worth mentioning that legitscrip.com hasn’t rate it as “rogue”. The website seems popular though.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMypharmacyconnect.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the myPharmacyConnect is only a service for patients and pharmacists, prices and discounts on products are out of question. Same is true for coupon codes. However, registration on the website is free.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMypharmacyconnect.com is a helpful app that enables patients and pharmacists to connect with each other. The website allows patients to get timely refills from trustworthy sources. On the other hand pharmacies have been able to reduce their return on stock. There are no customer reviews about myPharmacyConnect elsewhere, other than the website. In the lights of these facts, it is advisable that customers should contact the representatives of the company and remove their doubts regarding quality of pharmacies and medicines, and the confidentiality of their medical profile. The website isn’t a direct seller or medical products, its purpose is to give customers a range of medicines and direct them to online pharmacies to purchase them.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMy Drug Store is an online platform that offers information about medicines and treatments for different kinds of health issues. The website isn’t a direct seller or medical products, its purpose is to give customers a range of medicines and direct them to online pharmacies to purchase them.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe range of medicines and treatments pertain with antibiotics, antidepressants, birth control, headache, men’s health, motion sickness, weight loss, erectile dysfunction, and much more. Customers can choose the required category, select the medicine they intend to buy and click on “Purchase” option besides the strength and price. The website will redirect them to the pharmacy to purchase their selected medicines.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPrices offered by the website are quite within the range of customers. For example, generic Cialis 20mg pills are available at a rate of $36.99 for 10 pills. Customers can buy up to 90 pills for $192.99.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBelow the product, the website displays its description, manufacturer’s details, active ingredients and the manner in which it must be taken. However, that there are additional countries drawn in.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EUpon checking the website on scam alert sites, such as scamvoid.com, it was found that the website doesn’t offer any threat to customers. Medicines are quite affordable. For example, Baby Ayr Saline Nose spray 1.oz pack is available at $3.97. Apart from low prices, the online discount pharmacy offers many discount opportunities for customers. Navarro saving club offers over 300 generic medications and customers can choose 100 tablets for just $9.99.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can create their accounts on the website.
