The company offers medical and health products for all ages. Customers around the world can find a wide range of products on this website. The online store has a massive number of products categorized into medicines, beauty and body, spa, baby care, eye care, first aid, OTC, nutrition and wellness, skin care, sexual health, vitamins and more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMedShop Express is a US based online shop established in 2002. The company offers medical and health products for all ages. Customers around the world can find a wide range of products on this website. The online store has a massive number of products categorized into medicines, beauty and body, spa, baby care, eye care, first aid, OTC, nutrition and wellness, skin care, sexual health, vitamins and more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe US based online shop features branded products, such as Sebamed Liquid Face and Body Wash, Rogaine Extra Strength for Men, UniSom SleepGel 32 and many others. Prices of these products are also quite affordable and lower than other local shops. For example, Bactine Pain Relieving Cleansing Spray 5oz. is available at $6.05.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EApart medical and health products, customers can also find household items, gifts, wholesale products, toys and games, and food and gourmet on the website. The online shop provides special deals and discounts for its customers, as well.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMedshop Express delivers worldwide at a flat rate shipping rate of $6.95. Customers can contact the company through phone, email and postal mail, or they can click on “customer service” option at the bottom of the page and forward their complaints to the company. Purchased products can be returned to the company within 30 days, customers will get their refund after deduction of 10% restocking fee.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMedshopexpress.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMedShop Express has been in the business for 13 years now, but hasn’t been able to get sufficient amount of customer reviews on independent review platforms, except for two occasions. We have found two customer reviews with disappointed feedback about the online shop.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Medshopexpress.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Medshopexpress.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10500\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to Hassan Zabolli from California, MedShop Express is more of a garbage basket than a company. The customer expressed his disappointment on the lack of customer service. According to the customers, there is no way to contact the website to resolve your issues. He was charged with $100 for a small pack and there was nothing he could do to get his refund.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Medshopexpress.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Medshopexpress.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10501\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn complaintsboard.com, a customer lodged a complain against MedShop Express, stating that he received very short and unconvincing reply to his email. However, BBB further reported that the company has not received any complaints on this platform. According to BBB, the company exists and has a good reputation.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMedshopexpress.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe lack of customer review regarding any business increases doubts over reliability. There are no positive or negative reviews about the company during 2014 and 2015.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMedshopexpress.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMedShop Express offers quite a few opportunities to its customers to save their money. Some of them are described below:\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Medshopexpress.com-Coupon-Codes.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Medshopexpress.com Coupon Codes\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10503\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EHot Deals: The online pharmacy offers hot deals for men, women and kids. Customers can get discounts on their favorite products.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003E5% Off: The online pharmacy offers a promotion, giving customers with 5% off shipping on their next orders, if they join the mailing list of the company.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Shipping Coupon: The online pharmacy also offers free domestic shipping on orders more than $49. Customers are required to enter the code “SHIPUSA49” while checking out.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Sample: MedShop Express promotes new products by offering free samples. Customers can see updates of the products available on the website, and get them with their original orders, by adding them in their shopping carts.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMedshopexpress.com has a wide range of products. The website offers discounts on medicines and health products as well, and gives saving opportunities to its customers worldwide. However, except for two occasions, customers have shared their reviews about the online shop anywhere on the internet. The two reviews were actually the complaints that highlighted a big flaw in the website – the lack of customer support. The website might be doing well, but a lot of customers might also be turning away from it because of the lack of phone support. This is something that this business needs to consider. Overall, the website receives a rating of 2.5 out of 5. Customers are advised to exercise precaution, and contact customer service to discuss their concerns.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/medshopexpress.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2.5\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/pharmacy-reviews-a-legal-option-for-canada-based-pharmacy\/","title":"Pharmacy Reviews – A Legal Option for Canada Based Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/pharmacy.ca","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmacy.ca-Review-880x320-1431624550.jpg","annotation":"Pharmacy.ca or Personalized Medicine is an online pharmacy based in province of Ontario, Canada and owned by PurePharm.Inc. The online Pharmacy is a licensed pharmacy that also operates as a retail pharmacy with an established shop for last 30 years at downtown Toronto. The website is also operated by a team of well experienced and qualified medical professionals. The online store sells an array of products under different product categories that include Arthritis, Hair Loss, Medical Tests, Allergy, Personal Care and many more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacy.ca or Personalized Medicine is an online pharmacy based in province of Ontario, Canada and owned by PurePharm.Inc. The online Pharmacy is a licensed pharmacy that also operates as a retail pharmacy with an established shop for last 30 years at downtown Toronto. The website is also operated by a team of well experienced and qualified medical professionals. The online store sells an array of products under different product categories that include Arthritis, Hair Loss, Medical Tests, Allergy, Personal Care and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered at the online store are also very competitive. For example, one of their featured products, Hydrosal Gel 15% 30ml is offered for only $19.99 at a special price. The actual price of the product is $20.79. Another of their featured product, Preparation H Cooling Gel 25g is offered for only $9.99. Even though, prescription is require for most of the orders but customers can also order without prescription for products listed under their non-prescription medicine category.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact their support through phone contact, email and online form. Customers can pay through Visa and MasterCard. The online store does not return and refund prescription drugs but non prescription drugs can be returned for refund. The shipping is available within Canada only and takes 2 to 5 business days to deliver orders.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacy.ca Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the online store caters to the needs of only Canadian based customers, their target market is very limited, one of the reasons of limited customer feedback about them on internet. Even though, the online feedback is limited and not available but the online store is not rated negatively by scam alert websites of LegitScript, a website that verify online pharmacies according to the set standards for online pharmacies.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThis indicates that the online pharmacy is a legitimate business, a licensed pharmacy with a verified address and head office based in Canada. The only drawback is it offers shipping to only Canada.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacy.ca Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is still limited in 2014 and 2015 but trust rating remained high in last couple of years. There is only one customer review available on Google reviews about them in 2014, posted 10 months ago by Lore Mallet who claimed that he is dealing with the online store for last 12 years, which indicates that the online pharmacy is offering its services for many years and also enjoys loyal following. The customer also praised their customer service and staff and rated them informative, accommodating and supportive. He also claimed that their delivery is always in time. All in all, the customer rated the pharmacy 5 out of 5.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmacy.ca-Reviews-2014-2015.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Pharmacy.ca Reviews 2014 2015\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10650\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBased on their online reputation that is limited but all positive, Pharamcy.ca looks like a legitimate online option for customers based in Canada.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacy.ca Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than their affordable prices, the online store also offers few additional deals that allows customers to save more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Shipping: The online store offers free shipping on few of the listed products. For example, Villicote for IBD is offered with free shipping to Canada.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECurrent Deals: The website offers a link to “Current Deals” page on the website with a list of products that are available for special discounts. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/pharmamarketonlinenow-com-reviews-suspicious-online-pharmacy-with-low-trust-rating-and-lack-of-customer-feedback\/","title":"Pharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews – Suspicious Online Pharmacy with Low Trust Rating and Lack of Customer Feedback","url":"http:\/\/pharmamarketonlinenow.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmamarketonlinenow.com-Review-880x320-1431625481.jpg","annotation":"Pharma Market is a licensed online pharmacy that sells generics drugs related to ED and other health issues. All the listed generics at the online pharmacy are manufactured at renowned Indian manufacturers and approved by Indian FDA before shipment to customers. All orders are also processed and shipped directly from India. Their featured products are sexual health and ED related but customers can also shop under other product categories like Blood Pressure, Gums, Healthy Bones, Women’s Health, Weight Loss, Stop Smoking, Party Pills and many more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharma Market is a licensed online pharmacy that sells generics drugs related to ED and other health issues. All the listed generics at the online pharmacy are manufactured at renowned Indian manufacturers and approved by Indian FDA before shipment to customers. All orders are also processed and shipped directly from India. Their featured products are sexual health and ED related but customers can also shop under other product categories like Blood Pressure, Gums, Healthy Bones, Women’s Health, Weight Loss, Stop Smoking, Party Pills and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices listed on the online pharmacy are also very competitive if not the lowest. For example, generic Viagra is available for $0.89 that is cheaper than over-the-counter prices but lower prices are also available on few other online pharmacies. Cialis is available for $1.53 while Levitra is available for only $1.81 per pill.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy offers 100% money back guarantee and accepts all major credit and debit cards, Wire Transfer and Money Transfer for payment. Customer service is available through dedicated phone lines for US, UK and Australian customers along with email and online form. Customers can choose between EMS and regular airmail delivery options for shipment of their orders. EMS takes 10 days while airmail takes 21 to 28 days to deliver customer’s orders. Shipments are also trackable through tracking number.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOnline feedback and customer reviews are very limited about Pharma Market. In fact, the only source of customer feedback is in the form of the testimonials posted on their own website. Other than that, customer reviews are nonexistent on the internet. This indicates that the online store is not much popular among customers yet. The age of the website is also just 2 and a half years old that indicates the pharmacy is still new in the industry.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmamarketonlinenow.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Pharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10653\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to the scam alert websites, the online pharmacy is not a legit or trustworthy website to do business with. It is also rated as the Rogue pharmacy by authorities.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBased on their online reputation, warnings from scam alert websites and lack of customer feedback on unbiased review sources makes Pharma Market a suspicious online store. Customers are advised to buy from other trusted sources unless they read positive reviews about them on internet in future.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs in past, customer feedback and online reviews are not available on the internet in 2014 and 2015 but only in the form of testimonials on their own website. As all these testimonials are moderated by the websites staff, they are not much reliable. All the listed testimonials are all positive and in favor of the website services and quality.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmamarketonlinenow.com-Reviews-2014-2015.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Pharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews 2014 2015\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10654\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOne customer, Dennis Powell claimed that he had previously bad experiences with online pharmacies but was surprised after dealing with the Pharma Market with an awesome shopping experience. He claimed that their products are also high quality.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than all positive testimonials on their own website, there is no other online review in addition to negative trust rating from scam alert websites that makes them not a good option to do financial business with.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmamarketonlinenow.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered are very competitive at Pharma Market but other than that, no more special discounts and offers are available on their website. The products are also shipped directly from India without any involvement of US drug authorities that also add to the risk. Customer feedback is nonexistent that makes them unpopular. The online store was founded in 2004 and serving the customers in North America for last 11 years. It is also an accredited member of Certified Canadian International Pharmacies. The online store required a valid prescription from an authentic source to process the orders. The products are not listed under any category but customers can search the drug by typing the name in search box that look little inconvenient if compared to other online pharmacies.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanada Prescriptions Plus is a Canadian based online pharmacy with its head office situated at Surrey, Canada. The online store was founded in 2004 and serving the customers in North America for last 11 years. It is also an accredited member of Certified Canadian International Pharmacies. The online store required a valid prescription from an authentic source to process the orders. The products are not listed under any category but customers can search the drug by typing the name in search box that look little inconvenient if compared to other online pharmacies.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website offers attractive prices on listed drugs as it claims to save 30% to 80% for the customers on prescription drugs. The brand name Viagra is available for $47 per 4 pills while the generic Viagra 100mg 4 pills are available for $14. Even though, these prices are competitive but customers can easily find generic Viagra at much cheaper price on other online sources.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EShipping charges within North America are $9.95 but all orders above $300 are shipped for free. Shipping is currently limited to only North America. Customers can order for their products through online form, fax, phone and email while customer service is available on toll free phone number, email and fax. Customers can create an online account to order and can pay through all major credit cards, money orders, personal checks, e-checks and bank certified cheques.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadaprescriptionsplus.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback and online reviews are hard to find about the Canada Prescription Plus which indicates that the pharmacy is not well known and unpopular among customers. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/drugstore-pharmacy-reviews-a-pharmacy-network-with-no-trust\/","title":"Drugstore Pharmacy Reviews – A Pharmacy Network with No Trust","url":"http:\/\/drugstorepharmacy.ca","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Drugstorepharmacy.ca-Review-880x320-1431620924.jpg","annotation":"The URL under review has been inactive. While typing “Drugstorepharmacy.ca” customers will be redirected to another page named “Yourhealthmattershere.ca”. It might be due to the latest updates, the website has changed its URL.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe URL under review has been inactive. While typing “Drugstorepharmacy.ca” customers will be redirected to another page named “Yourhealthmattershere.ca”. It might be due to the latest updates, the website has changed its URL.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is actually a pharmacy network that offers links to 24 different online stores divided into western region, central region, and Atlantic region. Some of the stores that can be accessed via this website, include Extra Food, Loblaws City Market, Fortinos, Maxi\/Maxi \u0026amp; Co, Dominion, Save Easy and more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWhile the main website doesn’t sell anything, customers have to pay according to the payment methods available on the linked websites. For example, No Frill store offers prescription and refills on credit card, debit card and cash.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESimilarly, customers cannot find anything in terms of discount and special deals, they have to visit the links to see if there’s any discount they can avail. There is no help and support for the customers on the website where they can contact and remove their concerns.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugstorepharmacy.ca Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugstore Pharmacy (now Your Health Matters Here) has not received too many reviews from the customers. It indicates that the website isn’t as popular as other online stores. We have found just one customer review on independent review websites. The review was published 7 years ago. A customer named pheaonix165 reviewed that Drug Store Pharmacy, Canada is a very good pharmacy. The customer said it is a good place to drugs from. In the end, the customer also recommended the website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Drugstorepharmacy.ca-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Drugstorepharmacy.ca Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10642\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBut just one review is not enough to justify the authenticity of any business. Review24rx indicated that the online drugstore has a very low trust rating and there is a huge ambiguity with respect to product quality also.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBecause there is too much doubt involved, one needs to be careful while dealing with the online pharmacy network.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugstorepharmacy.ca Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugstorepharmacy.ca or yourhealthmattershere.ca seems to have a low reputation because none of the customers gave their feedback about the website. There is too much doubt and ambiguity involved with this online pharmacy network.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugstorepharmacy.ca Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECoupon Codes and discount offers are not available on the main website, but customers can find discounts on the linked websites. The website is actually a network of drugstores and pharmacies, but it fails to provide trustworthiness as there is no proof that if customers are mishandled, they will be remunerated by the network. Apart from the lack of customer reviews, Review24rx.info indicated that the online pharmacy does not match its standards. The website offers ED and Sexual Health drugs as their featured products but customers can also shop under different other categories like Allergy, Arthritis, Blood Pressure, Cancer, Eye Drop, Herbals, Hair Loss, Weight Loss, Skin Care, Sleeping Aids and many more. The website also allows customers o buy drugs without any need of prescription.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their array of options that allows customers to buy all their medicines from one online source, the website also offers special and rock bottom prices on their listed generics. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/canada-drug-mart-reviews-an-online-pharmacy-without-any-recognition\/","title":"Canada Drug Mart Reviews – An Online Pharmacy without Any Recognition","url":"http:\/\/canadadrugmart.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Canadadrugmart.com-Review-880x320-1431595286.jpg","annotation":"Canada Drug Mart is an online pharmacy that is based in Canada but caters to the medical needs of worldwide customers. The Access Canada Drug Mart is a licensed Canadian pharmacy with its head office situated in Winnipeg, Canada. The website needs a valid prescription to process order after it is approved by the licensed physicians. Customers can order up to 3 months of supply of any medicine they want. Customers can search for their drugs by typing the name of the drug at search box or search under the alphabetical categories.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanada Drug Mart is an online pharmacy that is based in Canada but caters to the medical needs of worldwide customers. The Access Canada Drug Mart is a licensed Canadian pharmacy with its head office situated in Winnipeg, Canada. The website needs a valid prescription to process order after it is approved by the licensed physicians. Customers can order up to 3 months of supply of any medicine they want. Customers can search for their drugs by typing the name of the drug at search box or search under the alphabetical categories.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the online store are also very attractive other than their wide options of products. The price of 4 Viagra generic pills 56.50 that is comparatively higher than the price of generic drugs found on other online pharmacies selling generic drugs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can pay through credit cards, PayPal, international money order and personal checks. To connect with their customer support, customers can contact through phone, email, live chat and online form. For North American orders, the online pharmacy charges a flat rate of $13 while for other shipping costs $25 to other international destinations. Shipping takes 7 to 21 days based on the method of shipping selected. The online pharmacy does not accept returns on delivered products.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadadrugmart.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is not available anywhere on the internet about the pharmacy. Other than that, there is no online feedback about their services and product quality.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Canadadrugmart.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadadrugmart.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10623\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online source for verification of online pharmacies Legit Script listed the online pharmacy among unapproved pharmacy for not meeting a set of standards for verification of online pharmacies. At present, the online health store offers only two products to its customers.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EHealthyMale is an online entity where customers can find health supplements. The website is for both, men and women. At present, the online health store offers only two products to its customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website seems new as there is no information about its origin and purpose. While navigating on the website, all the tabs are empty, with no information whatsoever. The orders are shipped via Amazon Shipping and the website claims to deliver these products within 24 hours. According to the tab at the bottom of the page, the website is owned by Secure Medical Inc and service is provided by Amazon. It means that the international product delivery service, Amazon, offers backup support with respect to contact and mode of payment.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EHealthymale.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EHealthy Male has not received any customer reviews. The feedback from the customers are not available on the website as well, in fact there is nothing to share online. It may have been the case that the website is going through building process, so there is nothing for the customers to share about it. Nevertheless, it counts against the website. The online health store appears to be unreliable.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn the other hand, scam alert website, such as legitscript.com indicated that the website has not been listed. But here, the situation is entirely different.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the online health care store has established in 2015, it is unable to get any reviews from the customer. As they are new, without any recognition from customers, the risk is involved.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/greaterlondonpharmacy.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/fillrxplus-reviews-unbelievable-prices-but-a-risky-online-store\/","title":"Fillrxplus Reviews – Unbelievable Prices but a Risky Online Store","url":"http:\/\/fillrxplus.net","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/04\/Fillrxplus.net-Review-880x320-1429928715.jpg","annotation":"FillRxPlus is a Canadian based online pharmacy that sells generic drugs to their worldwide customers. The online pharmacy is doing business for last 7 years. All the listed drugs are high quality generics that are manufactured at the licensed and renowned Indian based pharmaceutical companies. All the orders are shipped directly from India that are approved by Indian FDA before shipping. The online pharmacy is among the network of pharmacies that work under one parent company. The online store sells ED, sexual and men’s health products as their featured products but customers can also shop under different product categories like Pain Relief, Sleep Aid, Quit Smoking, Herbals, Heart Diseases, Blood Pressure and more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFillRxPlus is a Canadian based online pharmacy that sells generic drugs to their worldwide customers. The online pharmacy is doing business for last 7 years. All the listed drugs are high quality generics that are manufactured at the licensed and renowned Indian based pharmaceutical companies. All the orders are shipped directly from India that are approved by Indian FDA before shipping. The online pharmacy is among the network of pharmacies that work under one parent company. The online store sells ED, sexual and men’s health products as their featured products but customers can also shop under different product categories like Pain Relief, Sleep Aid, Quit Smoking, Herbals, Heart Diseases, Blood Pressure and more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their wide product range, the prices offered are also among the lowest available on the internet on any local pharmacy. The prices are also much lower than the actual wholesale prices. For example, customers can buy Viagra for only $0.37 per pill. This price is difficult to find anywhere else on the internet. Similarly, Cialis is available for only $0.46 per pill that is also cheaper than wholesale price.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can get full refund or free exchange of lost orders as the pharmacy offers 100% delivery guarantee. Payment options include all major credit cards including Visa and MasterCard. Customer service is available through toll free phone contacts along with designated lines for US and Europe based customers. Shipping is available through airmail shipping or EMS Courier.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFillrxplus.net Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThere is no online feedback or recognition from any customer about their drugs quality and services. On the other hand, scam alert websites warn to stay away from the website as they find it risky to do financial business with. The only form of feedback available is the online testimonials but the similar testimonials are available on many other websites operated by same network that makes them fake and untrustworthy to base our final conclusion on.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy belongs to a network of similar looking online pharmacies that are running under one parent company. Most of the websites running under the same network are listed as rogue pharmacies and rated as scam or untrustworthy websites by scam alert websites. Even the online testimonials used are same that are copy pasted on multiple domains that often direst to similar website with just change in domain name.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBased on the limited feedback and negative online reputation, the website is a risk to shop from.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFillrxplus.net Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe story remained same in 2014 and 2015 as there are still no reviews or customer feedback on any review website. The staff at ThriftMedsNow than consult a local physician who orders a Canadian prescription which is filled by Canadian pharmacist. All the listed drugs on the website are approved by Canada’s Health Protection Branch which equivalent to United States FDA. The order process is prescription based in which a customer sends the website their prescription. The staff at ThriftMedsNow than consult a local physician who orders a Canadian prescription which is filled by Canadian pharmacist. This way, even non Canadian can buy prescription drugs from the website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website offers every type of drug related to any health condition based on the valid prescription. Customers are required to submit a release form, a medical history form, a prescription order form and customer’s valid prescription to process orders. The process of prescription verification and delivery of products takes 8 to 12 days.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can pay through credit cards of Visa and MasterCard, money order or certified check for their orders. To reach customer service, contact through phone numbers or email. The shipping is offered for all across the globe for $10 on orders that are less than $100. All the generics available at the store are manufactured by well known and reputable pharmacies to ensure quality.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThriftymeds.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is extremely rare about the online pharmacy. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/usarx-reviews-affordable-rates-but-no-customer-approval\/","title":"Usarx Reviews – Affordable Rates but No Customer Approval","url":"http:\/\/www.usarx.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Usarx.com-Review-880x320-1438274141.jpg","annotation":"This company basically serves as the provider to various other pharmaceutical companies across the USA from which customers can buy medications. It serves as a kind of means to help customers avail discount at these other websites by providing them with the required means to be able to do so.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThis company basically serves as the provider to various other pharmaceutical companies across the USA from which customers can buy medications. It serves as a kind of means to help customers avail discount at these other websites by providing them with the required means to be able to do so.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThis company basically operates on a loyalty based operation which is specially designed to offer customers relief and ease of transaction. Customers can sign up for a USA Rx Card through which they can easily get up to 75% worth of discounts and save up to an average of 51% on the prescription medicines that they order. The website provides this facility for almost over 60,000 participating pharmacies located across the country.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe Rx Card acts as a bridge for those who wish to buy medicines online without having to go through the painstaking issues of tedious shipping and unaffordable budgets. This allows them to save instantly and wisely. The company operates on the principle of customer satisfaction. To assure this, they are available at any day of the week via phone or email and their Customer Service Officers can be contacted 24\/7 via any of these means.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EUsarx.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEven after an extensive research online, there were no customer reviews found for this website. This could be an indication of the fact that this website is not really trustworthy and customers and patients must be vary while ordering from this website. While it could also mean that maybe no reviews have made their way online, it is best advised to stay safe rather than taking a risk with your money as well as health.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESome reviews and testimonials were found about this website, however, they were found on the company’s own blog and website which does not assure customer credibility.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11218\u0022 src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Usarx.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Usarx.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EApart from customer reviews, this company has also been vouched for by their employees. Hence, conclusively, we can hold off judgement about the credibility of this website until any bad reviews emerge online regarding the services of this company.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EUsarx.com Discount Coupons\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to the research conducted, it was deduced that while the company does not offer any Coupon Codes, there are other “apparent” perks available on this website. Whether or not this offer is valid or trustworthy is however questionable.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EConclusion\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIt is quite easy to deduce that this visually and verbally this company has a lot to offer. Not only do the people who run this company apparently making medical care affordable but they are also developing very good relationships with their customer base. The company promises to value their customers the most and tends to put their customers first before anything else. However, there is a major contradiction between what the company appears to be doing in comparison with what online research results have revealed. Two reputable verification websites have given produced results which definitely deem this company suspicious. These reasons all constitute to this company receiving a rating of 1.5 out of 5. The images are all high quality and everything is available on the home page for the convenience of the customers. The website ships its products through some of the best names in the business and provides customers plenty of payment options to choose from. As far as the authenticity of the website is concerned, the company is listed as rogue on the scam alert website; however, there are plenty of customer reviews that have good things to say about the website. Despite its illegitimacy in the scam alert websites, good reviews about the pricing and shipping of the products earn the pharmacy 2.5 stars out of 5. There is every chance that the ranking might improve if the company focuses more towards providing better service to their customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/controlledpills.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2.5\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The store runs with the name of “Canadian Overnite” selling generic drugs for health issues such as Blood pressure, cholesterol, Erectile Dysfunction. It also sells skin care products and sleeping aid.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe medicines available at Canada Overnite are all generic. The store does not sell any brands due to copyright issues. However, these generic drugs are exact clones of branded medicines and are relatively cheaper the branded medicines. For instance, their best seller Viagra pills are priced at $0.67 each. Similarly, Cialis Super Active Plus is available at $2.81 per pill. All these medicines are approved by FDA and are safe to use.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe medicines are manufactured and shipped from India to almost all parts of the world. Payments are accepted via Visa, Master, Diners Club, Amex, JCB.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIf in any case, the order is not delivered the company may reship the order without any charges. The website claims to offer up to 90% low prices on some of their drugs. The website sells both prescription and over the counter drugs to their customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website requires prescription to process the orders and customers need to create their online profiles to order from them. The lack of customer feedback indicates that the website may be not as popular as other online stores dealing in Cialis products. Upon further investigation on legitscript.com, it was found that the online pharmacy has very poor credibility.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EWith very little to be found on the internet and a straight negative response from a reliable resource, the online pharmacy has not been able to convince anyone with its products and services.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECialis.name Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOne very good thing about this website is their prompt response and support to their clients. This is one reason that people have shown interest in buying products from them:\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Cialis.name-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Cialis.name Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100% class=\u0022\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn February 15, 2015 a person (name not mentioned) suffering from diabetes posted the query which was followed by a satisfying response from the website. The company posted a reply recommending 100mg Viagra or 100mg Cialis to treat his issue.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EHowever, the fact remains that the online pharmacy has too much to prove in order to get the recommendation.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECialis.name Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online Turkish pharmacy offers low price and discounts to its customers. For example, 1 packet of Cialis 20mg 30 pills is available at 99TL while 3 packets are available at 209TL.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther discounts, special offers and coupon codes are not available on the website at present. The featured products of the online pharmacy are mostly ED and sexual health drugs but the website also sells drugs related to Hair Loss and Diet Pills. The website claims to offer large variety of drugs that counter impotence and other similar problems. Some of the popular ED drugs available at the store are Viagra, Cialis, Levitra and Kamagra.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFarmacia-es.com is a Spanish website which represents Spain Online Pharmacy, an online store which sells a large variety of drugs to its customers. The featured products of the online pharmacy are mostly ED and sexual health drugs but the website also sells drugs related to Hair Loss and Diet Pills. The website claims to offer large variety of drugs that counter impotence and other similar problems. Some of the popular ED drugs available at the store are Viagra, Cialis, Levitra and Kamagra.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices are listed in Euro as the products are sold to customers in Spain. Prices are comparatively high as 4 pills of Viagra is available for 58 Euros. The website claims to offer original drugs instead of generics, one of the probable reasons why their prices are high.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website also has presence on different social media platforms but most of the accounts are inactive. The information about their shipping is not available but the website caters to the needs of customers in Spain. Information about their refund policy is not available. The website accepts all major credit cards as payment method. Customers can reach their staff through phone contact and email. The website is just of one page website with no other links except of product pages. One positive about the website is that they provide detailed information about each listed drug along with side effects.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EFarmacia-es.com Reviews\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is limited about the online store. The only review about the website was in 2015 which is positive but in Spanish language. Other than that, there is no review or feedback on any other review website. As the website only offers limited Sexual Health drugs that are offered to only Spanish customers, this may be the reason of lack of reviews.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Farmacia-es.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Farmacia-es.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11373\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than lack of reviews, the trust rating from scam alert websites is also very low. A NABP recognized online organization, Legit Script which validates online pharmacies against the set of verification standardsrated it as rogue pharmacy on 18\u003Csup\u003Eth\u003C\/sup\u003E April, 2013, the most alarming and lowest rating for fake pharmacies. Scam Adviser, another popular scam alert website also rated is as risky website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EFarmacia-es.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe only feedback the website received is on 18\u003Csup\u003Eth\u003C\/sup\u003EApril, 2015 which is in Spanish and rated the website 5 out of 5. On a popular review website, Trust Pilot, the website earns an overall rating of 7.4 out of 10. But other than that review, there is no more feedback about them. On the other hand, trust rating remained low for them from scam alert websites as it is still listed as rogue pharmacy or suspicious online store.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Farmacia-es.com-Reviews-2015.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Farmacia-es.com Reviews 2015\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11374\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, lack of reviews indicates that the website is risky and precaution is needed to buy from them. The unprofessional website design with broken links and incomplete information about their shipping, contact and other policies also makes them suspicious.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EFarmacia-es.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website offers very limited number of coupon codes and special offers. The only available discounts are in the form of trail packs as the website offers trail packs for both brand name and generic drugs. This allows customers to try out different version of sexual health drugs within a single pack without paying more for each drug separately. The online pharmacy offers 4 different trail packs under each category of brand name and generic drugs. For example, a trial pack that consists of brand name 10 Viagra pills and 4 Levitra pills is offered for only 125 Euro.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EConclusion\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website design is not only simple, but most of the links are not working on the website. It looks like that people behind the website are not serious. There is also no information about their shipping and payment methods. The prices listed on the website are also very high while the feedback available about them is also very limited. On the other hand, trust rating from scam alert websites is also low as it is listed as Rogue online pharmacy by Legit Script. The online pharmacy specializes in sexual health and ED drugs but medicines related to other medical conditions are also available like hair loss, weight loss, allergy relief, skin care, acid reflux and sensual lubricants.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccess RX also offers free medical review by licensed physician from United States. Established in 1998, Access RX is also one of the oldest online pharmacies which has served over half a million customers so far. All the products are shipped within two day in United States from only US licensed pharmacies. Prices offered by the Access RX are on the higher end as they only sell branded drugs. For example, Viagra is available for $23.25 for the purchase of 50 pills. All the products are branded from top manufacturers as the website does not sell any generic drugs for customer’s safety.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than email and online form, customers can contact customer service through toll free phone contact or live chat. The trial pack contains Viagra, Cialis and Levitra.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECoupon Codes. For example, use coupon code ED2015 to save 5% on orders of any drugs.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ESome other offers include $10 discount coupon for signing up with accessrx.com and 5% discount on the purchase of prescription medicines that include ED, Hair loss, Weight loss and skincare.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store, Access RX is well established and one of the online pharmacies working for decades and are still operational with positive customer feedback and great online reputation. Even though, there are few complaints and some of the scam alert websites rated it low for trustworthiness, but there are hundreds of reviews from satisfied and loyal customers on multiple review websites which shows that the website is a great online option for buying genuine drugs. As the online store only sells branded and real drugs, this pharmacy is not for people looking for low cost generics as the prices are also high. All in all, the online store deserves 4 out of 5 star rating.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022https:\/\/www.consumermeds.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E4\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The primary focus is on dogs, cats, birds, rodents, horse and fish etc.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe pet meds pharmacy claims to provide best solutions for canine disease, feline disease such as inflamed bowel which is caused by whipworm. The redirect, Canada Drugs itself is a well established online pharmacy which is approved and certified member of multiple association and verification websites like CIPA, MIPA, BBB and Pharmacy Checker.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website sells prescription based drugs, over the counter medicines and refills. The prices of the drugs are also low. For example, Propecia 1 mg is offered for only $2.72 per pill. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/drugprice-reviews-not-an-online-pharmacy-but-a-kenyan-website-to-check-drug-prices\/","title":"Drugprice Reviews – Not an Online Pharmacy but a Kenyan Website to Check Drug Prices","url":"http:\/\/drugprice.org","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Drugprice.org-Review-880x320-1440075798.jpg","annotation":"Drugprice.org is a Kenyan based website that is not an online pharmacy, but serves as a reference pricing system which provides detailed information about large number of different drugs along with their standard prices to keep prices in check. The purpose of the drugprice.org is to not to let pharmaceutical companies to charge more on their price as the detailed system calculates prices in Kenya based on the international prices, shipping costs and other add-ons.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugprice.org is a Kenyan based website that is not an online pharmacy, but serves as a reference pricing system which provides detailed information about large number of different drugs along with their standard prices to keep prices in check. The purpose of the drugprice.org is to not to let pharmaceutical companies to charge more on their price as the detailed system calculates prices in Kenya based on the international prices, shipping costs and other add-ons.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe guide provides a detailed drug price referencing guide to all public procurement agencies based on all the medicines listed under KEML (Kenya Essential Medicine List). The website runs under TI-Kenya, also known as Transparency International Kenya which is a non-profit organization that was founded in 1999. The goal of the organization and websites working under its umbrella like drugprice.org is to promote transparent, accountable and corruption free Kenya.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website also has presence on top social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook and YouTube. The website also provides information about large variety of drugs, their prices, drug formulation and prescription, and names of drug suppliers and their authenticity. Users or companies can make their own account on the website, view drug directory, read latest news on their official blog or make use of their android app on smart phones. The head office of the website is situated in Nairobi, Kenya while interested people can contact them through email or their phone contacts.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EDrugprice.org Reviews\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the website is not an online pharmacy, but it is a website runs by Transparency International Kenya which only provides information about drugs available in Kenya and their prices. The goal of the organization is to keep prices in check by the local Kenyan drug pharmacies and sellers. As the website is not selling anything, they don’t have any customer reviews or legitimacy rating from scam alert websites. It is an authentic website which is operated by a well known organization. The website is a good source but only for Kenyan people and companies.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EDrugprice.org Reviews 2015\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEven in 2015, there is no feedback as the website is not selling anything, so they don’t have any customers, but only visitors who seek information about medicines and their prices. As far as their authenticity is concerned, the website is authentic and operated by a well know non-profit organization.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EDrugprice.org Coupon Codes\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the website does not sell anything and just provides information related to standard prices of the drugs to keep pharmaceutical companies in check and to educate consumers, there are no offers or special deals listed on drugprice.org.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E\u003Cstrong\u003EConclusion\u003C\/strong\u003E\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is very simple in design but it provides all the information that it promises to provide. It also offers users to create their own personalized profile and also allows downloadable version of android app which helps users to use the website on their smart devices. They also host an informational blog along with active social media platforms. It is also operated by a well knownorganization, Transparency International Kenya which makes it authentic. All in all, the website is useful for price check of drugs but only for Kenyan people, this is why it is rated as 2.5 out of 5 due to its limited use.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/drugprice.org\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2.5\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The online store claims to be one of the leading pharmacies in the world. The website offers thousands of prescription generic and brand name drugs along with over-the-counter products. Some of their popular products categories include Anti Fungus, Diabetic Drugs, Anti-Allergic, Asthma, Antibiotics and many other but their featured products are all ED and Sexual Health drugs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to thousands of medicines listed on their website, they also offer rock bottom prices as the pharmacy claims to provide up to 80% savings on their listed drugs. The online store offers generic Viagra at low price of $0.73 per pill which is lower than actual average retail price which is normally between $0.9 and $1.1. Similarly, generic Cialis is offered for only $0.95 per which is also rock bottom and hard to match on other websites.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can reach the support through multiple options like live chat, toll free phone contact and email. Customers can also order online or on phone. The website accepts all major credit cards as payment method including Visa and MasterCard. The online store also offers 7 different shipping methods to deliver orders including free shipping.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEuro-clinics.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is very limited about the Euro Clinic. On the other hand, there are no complaints found about the online store which indicates that the services are satisfying customer so far. Services like shipping, prices and quality of the website are rated above average by most of the customers while website’s use of ease and customer service were also praised by the customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMost of the customers claimed that the prices offered by the online pharmacy are rock bottom and it makes it possible for them to afford their medication and health care needs. Customers also claimed that the online pharmacy offers high quality medicines including generics which are as effective as expensive brand name drugs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than positive customer feedback, the website is also not listed among rogue or risky website on any scam alert website. As there are no complaints available on anywhere on the internet about the website with no low trust rating from scam alert websites, this indicates that the website is a quality online option. The only thing lacking is the number of reviews which needs to be increased.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEuro-clinics.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EJust like previous years, there is no complaint or low trust rating from scam alert websites or online sources which validates online pharmacies. Even though, number of reviews is still low but every available feedback is positive so far with no issue raised by any customer yet. Customers are still satisfied with the quality, price and shipping. Customer service is also mostly rated as friendly, responsive and helping.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, the online pharmacy enjoys a great online reputation. It is an independent website which acts as a directory for online customers from where reviews regarding different sources, suppliers and products are available. Customers can find information about steroid suppliers and Peptide \u0026amp; HGH Suppliers while sources include several online drug stores.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website acts as a forum for thousands of users where customers can create accounts and login to the website where they can discuss, debate and vote upon different topics, compare different products, their advantages and disadvantages. The website is very useful in a way that it separates better online stores from scam websites on the basis of user reviews. A list of top ten sources is listed on the homepage to provide ease to the customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ELab reviews is also a value addition to the website and helps users to choose the most trusted and reliable labs at the time. The website has more than seven years of experience in online marketing of different medication services. The products are manufactured in India and shipped worldwide directly from renowned pharmaceutical companies in the country.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website provides FDA approved medications for different purposes such as Birth Control, Diabetes, Hair Loss, Erectile Dysfunction, Depression and other health issues. Special offers such as free pills with delivery orders attract the customers. Prices are affordable, speaking of which, a generic pill of Cialis for $0.77 and generic Dapoxetine at $1.04 that are lower than the retail price.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can track their orders by logging into the support site. Payments can be done through Echecks, Visa and Amex credit cards with highest level of protection. Shipping is done through Trackable Courier Service and International Airmail.
