{"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/canadavet-reviews-pet-medicine-at-lowest-rates-but-poor-online-reputation\/","title":"Canadavet Reviews – Pet Medicine at Lowest Rates But Poor Online Reputation","url":"http:\/\/www.canadavet.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Canadavet.com-Review-880x320-1438266591.jpg","annotation":"Canadavet.com was formed in Vancouver, Canada in 2005. The online pharmacy provides pet medication at affordable rates. The company has long list of medicines for pet owners to choose from. With over 21,000 happy customers in Canada and USA, the website claims to have customer satisfaction percentage of over 95%. The consumers can purchase the meds in either US or Canadian Dollars. The website offer over-the-counter drugs, so the customers do not need any sort of prescription to buy these products. The online drug store has fully practicing, licensed and qualified surgeons to make sure that all the products are up to the required standard. Canadavet.com has a separate category of each animal under which there different sort of medications. Drugs are available for animals like dog, cats, horses, fish and even reptiles. The online pharmacy has its official account on all major social media networks such as Twitter, Facebook and Pinterest. The company offers full money back guarantee as far as the quality is concerned. For Over-the-counter drugs, customers can get a full refund if they changed their mind, provided the med is sealed.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadavet.com was formed in Vancouver, Canada in 2005. The online pharmacy provides pet medication at affordable rates. The company has long list of medicines for pet owners to choose from. With over 21,000 happy customers in Canada and USA, the website claims to have customer satisfaction percentage of over 95%. The consumers can purchase the meds in either US or Canadian Dollars. The website offer over-the-counter drugs, so the customers do not need any sort of prescription to buy these products. The online drug store has fully practicing, licensed and qualified surgeons to make sure that all the products are up to the required standard. Canadavet.com has a separate category of each animal under which there different sort of medications. Drugs are available for animals like dog, cats, horses, fish and even reptiles. The online pharmacy has its official account on all major social media networks such as Twitter, Facebook and Pinterest. The company offers full money back guarantee as far as the quality is concerned. For Over-the-counter drugs, customers can get a full refund if they changed their mind, provided the med is sealed.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECandavet.com also takes pride in providing the cheapest medications online. Top seller meds like Frontline, which is available in the market for US$59.70 is available at the website for only $39.89. Another famous drug Revolution is only available for US$39.74, while it is available in the market for $49. Heartgard is available for $28.79 instead of $39.95.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers have plenty of ways to get in touch with the online pharmacy. The website contains a toll-free fax and telephone number. Also, the website provides complete postal addresses as well as email address for customers. Customers also have the facility to call and talk to agents directly from 6am to 5 pm for any complaints or queries. The website also offers free shipping for order over US$88. The pharmacy accepts all major debit and credit cards. Customers also have the facility to pay through PayPal. It is also 100% secured and virus free.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadavet.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews about the online store are limited but can be found on the internet.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Canadavet.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadavet.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11180\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMost of the customer reviews about Canadavet.com were negative. According to many customers who reviewed the website declared it as a scam. A lot of customers said that the drugs delivered to them looked like they were from Singapore instead of Canada. The company was also criticized for selling expired medications. One of the customers dog almost died after the he gave him an expired medicine. Luckily, the dog was saved by a local vet. A lot of customers also complained that the website, although, promises to ship on time, did not kept its word. Their packages were delayed and the agents did not co-operate when they called them. The customers complained that the complaint center does not pay a lot of attention to what the customers have to say.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadavet.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs far as the year 2015 is concerned, the customer reviews were hard to find. However, last year the company did receive a few good reviews. The absence of customer reviews could mean that the company is either in shambles or out of business completely.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadavet.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDespite providing medicine at low rates, canadavet.com also offers some discount coupons for its customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EOn purchase of 6 pack of Frontline Plus, the customers get one Pipette free.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EOn purchase of 12 pack of Frontline Plus, the customers get 2 pipettes free.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EWith 6 or 12 pack of Revolution, the customers get a free glowing dog collar or a Kong Cat Toy.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website has an extremely user friendly lay out with almost all major meds at the front to make it easier for the customers to but the medicine of their choice. The website provides various mediums to customers to get in touch with the company such as phone, email, fax and postal address. However, they feedback from the customers regarding all these services has been extremely negative over the years. Even though the pharmacy is offering meds at low prices and some great discount coupons, the complaints regarding expired meds have put the company’s reputation in jeopardy. However, one good thing about the pharmacy is that it offers free shipping on orders over $88. The scam alert websites does not have good things to say about the pharmacy either as they declare it as an illegitimate website to order drugs. The customer reviews regarding the company and its illegitimacy on scam alert websites only allows the pharmacy to get 2 stars out of 5 on the ratings.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/www.canadavet.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The well designed online store offers some of the world top brands on their website and also serves as the online pharmacy. The products are available under number of different categories which includes beauty, corporal, solar protection, children, oral health, food supplements, sexual health and other treatments. Some of their most popular products are sunscreen, vitamins and supplements and moisturizers.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFarmacia Barata is a Spanish online store which sells more than 3000 brands on their website. The well designed online store offers some of the world top brands on their website and also serves as the online pharmacy. The products are available under number of different categories which includes beauty, corporal, solar protection, children, oral health, food supplements, sexual health and other treatments. Some of their most popular products are sunscreen, vitamins and supplements and moisturizers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than an array of different products and categories, the online store also promises to offer very competitive prices for their products. For example, Eucerin Gentle Shampoo 400ml is available for 8.95 Euros. Another of their top sellers, Epaplus Collagen, 420 mg is available for just 16.95 Euros. The prices are comparatively competitive if not the lowest on internet. The prices are available in Euro as Spain is the primary market of the online store.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can reach their support and online consultation through their phone contact, email and online form. Customers can pay through all major credit cards and PayPal. The website also has strong presence on top social media platforms like Twitter, Facebook and YouTube. The content of the website is also in Spanish which shows that the website ships to only customers in Spain.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFarmaciabarata.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback about the online pharmacy is very limited. It may be because the website is new, available in Spanish language and only caters to the need of local Spanish customers. The website also does not have any feedback or trust score from scam alert websites. But according to one online source, unapprovedpharamcy.wordprss.com which displays a list of websites that are unapproved or listed as rogue by NABP shows the website among rogue pharmacy.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Farmaciabarata.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Farmaciabarata.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022684\u0022 height=\u0022200\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11465\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website also claims that the online pharmacy runs under a parent company, PillMan.com which also operates 60 more online pharmacies that are all listed as rogue pharmacies by NABP and FDA. Other than that, there is no more feedback about the website available which makes it hard to draw a final conclusion about them. From a look of their well designed website, they look like a legitimate website but couple of online sources listed them as rogue pharmacy which adds a little risk while buying from the website. If you are interested, make sure to talk to their support first before making a financial transaction.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFarmaciabarata.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EJust like previous years, there is no customer feedback in 2015 except of couple of sources which lists it as rogue pharmacy. The website is also not listed at Legit Script or scam adviser which makes it difficult to come up with final conclusion about their legitimacy. Lack of reviews also indicates that the website is still unpopular among customers as not many people are buying from them.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFarmaciabarata.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than their competitive prices, the online store also offers a separate link on their website which provides information about their discount deals and special offers. Customers can check back regularly to find an interested item on the deals page.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe design of the website is very attractive and modern which can easily catch an eye of the visitor. The information about their products, categories, deals and even their staff is available on their homepage with an excellent structure. The website also offers more than 3000 products from world’s top brands under different categories. The prices are also competitive if compared to other online stores. Even when, one online source listed them as rogue pharmacy working under a network of pharmacies, but the look of the online store is of genuine and authentic. The website also offers credit cards and PayPal, another reason why they must be legitimate as scam websites does not use PayPal due to their strict checks. All in all, the online pharmacy looks like a good option for customers in Spain but to avoid risks, make sure to contact their support before buying from them. For example, each tablet costs around $13 on the purchase of 10 tablets. On the purchase of 20 tablets, each tablet costs $12.50, $12 for each tablet on the purchase of 30 tablets and on buying 40 tablets, each tablet only costs around $11.50. The website not only offers thousands of drugs, but the online store also allows customers to save huge amount of money with up to 80% discounts. For example, the generic Viagra 100 mg is offered for only $1 Euro while the brand name Viagra is offered for 9.34 Euro. Even though, the website features sexual health and ED drugs as its featured drugs, but customers can also shop under different health categories to find thousands of more drugs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESome of their most popular product categories include antibiotic, diuretics, skin care, weight loss, anti herpes, women’s health, cardiovascular and more. To return an order due to any reason, customers can fill an online form along with reason of return. The website allows customers to order through their website or on phone.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ETo provide assistance to their global customers, the website is available in multiple languages other than English. Customers can contact their customer service through live chat, email or toll free phone contact. The head office of the online pharmacy is situated at London, UK. Customers can pay through major credit cards like Visa and MasterCard while multiple shipping options are also available to choose from. The online store also allows customers to track their orders on the website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EI-drugstore.net Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMost of the customers are satisfied and happy with the quality, prices and overall services provided by the online pharmacy. The sexual health drugs like Viagra, Cialis and Priligy are mostly praised for their effectiveness. Few customers claimed that the generics provided by the online pharmacy are not only extremely cheap but also as effective as branded ones.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/I-drugstore.net-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022I-drugstore.net Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11487\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers also praised the quick delivery and easy shipping of their orders. The consumers can choose from a wide variety of generic and brand name medicines that the website has to offer. Some of the popular meds include Wellbutrin XL (bupropion), Topamax generic (topiramate), Benicar (olmesarten), Plavix (clopidrogel) and others. The online drug store is known for selling medicines at extremely low price, providing their customers up to 80% discount on new prescriptions. The online pharmacy also sells Over the Counter drugs at extremely low rates. In case of any queries, the customers can call at a toll free number provided at on their homepage. Customers can also get in touch through fax number or directly through the email on website.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp\u003EPopular for selling prescription drugs, canadamednet.com is an online pharmacy selling quality prescription drugs to its customers all around the world. The consumers can choose from a wide variety of generic and brand name medicines that the website has to offer. Some of the popular meds include Wellbutrin XL (bupropion), Topamax generic (topiramate), Benicar (olmesarten), Plavix (clopidrogel) and others. The online drug store is known for selling medicines at extremely low price, providing their customers up to 80% discount on new prescriptions. The online pharmacy also sells Over the Counter drugs at extremely low rates. In case of any queries, the customers can call at a toll free number provided at on their homepage. Customers can also get in touch through fax number or directly through the email on website. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EDespite selling meds at low prices, canadamednet.com claims to sell medicines of highest quality. 90 tablets of Wellbutrin XL (300mg) are available at $200, whereas the market price is pretty close to $600. Likewise, Flomax generic 0.4 mg (100 capsules) are available for $80 only, giving customers a discount of over $250.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAlthough there is no return or exchange policy, the company does provide a full refund incase of damage or loss of package. Customers also get a refund if the right medicines aren’t delivered.  The online pharmacy accepts visa and master cards for payment. Customers can also pay through money orders or personal cheques.  \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ECanadamednet.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E As far as the customer reviews are concerned, there is not much available on the Internet. However, there were a few reviews here and there that didn’t have very good things to say about the online pharmacy. One of the customers said that it was hard for him to trust the website since it was not approved by the National Association of Boards of Pharmacy. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAccording to the customers, the disapproval of the pharmacy by the NABP puts a question mark on the safety of the medicines and credibility of the website. The customers also said that it was a high risk for their families to order medicines since they are unaware whether or not, the company is going to sell them expired medicines.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Canadamednet.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadamednet.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11305\u0022 \/\u003E\u003Cbr \/\u003E On the other hand, ratings from scam alert websites are also not in the favor of the online pharmacy. On Legit Script, the website is unapproved but not rogue, which is a more alarming pharmacy rating. Other scam alert websites also rated the online store low for trustworthiness and safety.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/08\/Canadamednet.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Canadamednet.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-11304\u0022 \/\u003E \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EBased on their poor online reputation, the online pharmacy looks like a risk to do business. \u003C\/p\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ECanadamednet.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EDespite searching on Internet for a long time, we were unable to find any reviews regarding the online pharmacy. Even though, we did manage to find some reviews from the previous years, there was hardly any customer review this year. This could be an indication of the fact that the website is either out of service, or not making any sales at all. Judging by the previous reviews, the pharmacy wasn’t doing particularly well with the consumers, but we have to wait and see if it receives any reviews in the future.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003ECanadamednet.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EAs far as the discount coupons are concerned, there aren’t any offered by the pharmacy as yet. We couldn’t find any discount vouchers on the website or other sources. However, the company does offer great discounts when you make a purchase, especially on new prescriptions. The customers can enjoy up to 80% discount on the meds. For example, 100 tablets of Topamax generic (100mg) is sold by the online pharmacy for only $160, whereas its original price in the market is $724, providing the customers a discount of $560.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThe layout of the website is pretty simple. It may not be as user friendly as the other online pharmacies but it certainly provides the prices of the major meds on the front page, for the convenience of the customers. The customers have the facility to call the pharmacy free of charge if they have any questions regarding their order. Unfortunately, the customers doesn’t get any discount coupons from the website, but they certainly get to enjoy some great discounts on every purchase.  \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EOne major drawback of the website is it is not endorsed by NABP, which raises a lot of eyebrows on its credibility, but the website itself claims to be safe. As far as the website’s legitimacy is concerned, it is labeled as rogue on all scam alert websites. Considering all these factors in mind, canadamednet.com gets 2 stars out of 5 on the ratings. However, it can all change with the pharmacies performance in the future.\u003Cbr \/\u003E \u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/canadamednet.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \u003C\/script\u003E \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E2\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The company sells meds from some of the most genuine and high quality brands in the world such as GSK, MERCK, Pfizer and plenty of others. The website deals in medicines like erectile dysfunction treatments, weight loss, hair loss, allergy, skin care, antivirals, sensual lubricants and others. In addition to their wide range of meds, the website sells mostly ED and Sexual Health drugs as their featured products. The website has licensed physicians that help you prescribe the medicine and save you lots of money.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EViagra stands as the pharmacy’s best seller. Other major medicines sold by the company include Levitra, Cialis, Staxyn, and Stendra, all ED and sexual health products. The prices offered for the brand name drugs are also very competitive if not the lowest. For example, Viagra is offered for $167.25 for a package of 6 doses.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe customers can get in touch with pharmacy through the number available on the website. The website allows the visitors to chat live with the experts and ask anything about the products directly.Besides that, the online pharmacy gives its customers the complete postal address. Chaacoca Moroccan Argan Oil is available in the market for $64.99, whereas the website sells it for $55.95 only. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/www-4rx-com-reviews-scam-copy-of-4rx-com\/","title":"Www-4rx.com Reviews –Scam Copy of 4rx.com","url":"http:\/\/www-4rx.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Www-4rx.com-Review-880x320-1437554804.jpg","annotation":"When you go to the home page of Www-4rx.com, it shows 4rx.com written on their header. But the 4rx.com is a different website that is currently offline which indicates that this URL is trying to lure their customers in absence of actual 4rc.com. The online pharmacy sells both brand name and generic drugs at guarantees low prices. Previously, 4rx.com was also redirecting their customers to their sister website, Aclespa.com but now, www-4rx.com is representing them but our research showed that 4rx.com and Www-4rx.com are entirely different websites but later is misusing 4rx.com logo.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWhen you go to the home page of Www-4rx.com, it shows 4rx.com written on their header. But the 4rx.com is a different website that is currently offline which indicates that this URL is trying to lure their customers in absence of actual 4rc.com. The online pharmacy sells both brand name and generic drugs at guarantees low prices. Previously, 4rx.com was also redirecting their customers to their sister website, Aclespa.com but now, www-4rx.com is representing them but our research showed that 4rx.com and Www-4rx.com are entirely different websites but later is misusing 4rx.com logo.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy sells wide range of brand name and generic drugs under different health categories which include Inflammation, Allergy, Eye Care, Weight Loss, Pain Relief, Smoking, Skin Care, Diabetes and many more. Other than wide range of listed drugs,the featured products are mostly listed under ED and Sexual Heath categories in the form of low cost generics.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website also claims to offer drugs, especially generics at the lowest prices possible. For example, the online pharmacy sells generic Viagra for $89 only for the set of 30 pills. Similarly, the generic Cialis is offered for only $109 for a set of 30 pills.Most of the generics listed on the online pharmacy are imported from recognized Indian based pharmaceutical companies.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe payment option is limited to only visa credit cards for now. The online store also offers guaranteed delivery which means in case of failed delivery, customers are entitled to free reshipment. Customers can also track online status of their orders on the website. The online pharmacy allows customers to contact their support through live chat, phone support and email at any time of the day.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWww-4rx.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews are not available anywhere for www-4rx.com but instead all of the reviews are for 4rx.com which means that the new website just emerges online and using the 4rx.com old information to get customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to one former affiliate who reviewed the online store in January 2012, the website went down in 2012 and they also shut down their affiliate program, causing financial loss to affiliates. He claimed that the website ran into legal problems.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than absence of reviews, the rating on scam alert websites is not on the positive side either. For example, the online pharmacy verification source, legit script rated them as rogue pharmacy which means they fail to meet the standards set by the Legit Script for online pharmacies or engages in deceptive or fraudulent online activities.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Www-4rx.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Www-4rx.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10978\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, the website is highly suspicious as it is using information and trying to take place of an older pharmacy 4rx.com which is no more operating and went down after complaints. It looked like a fake copy of the older version as it is also rated low for trust rating by scam alert websites.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWww-4rx.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EJust like previous years, there is nothing available for 2015 in terms of customer feedback or online reviews. As the website went down twice in last few years, redirected customers to the sister website and now appeared with the new website address, doing business with them is a risk due to their inconsistency. There are also warnings from scam alert websites. Due to these reasons and absence of reviews in 2015 and previous years and operating as a fake copy of 4rx.com, the online pharmacy is not recommended.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWww-4rx.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than their competitive prices, the online store also offers few additional deals and offers as listed below.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EDiscount for Returning Customers. For all reorders, the online pharmacy offers 10% discount irrespective of the size of the order.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EED Trail Packs. The online store also offers multiple ED trial packs on discounted price that allows customers to try multiple versions of ED drugs which comes with the same pack.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website’s design is very simple and basic. Due to lack of reviews, low trust rating from scam alert websites and an unethical attempt to use copy of an older pharmacy to lure customers, there is a high risk involved in doing business with them. In fact, it looked as the website did not get any reviews for the last three years. This could be a sign that the online pharmacy is either losing business or at the verge of shutting down. Customers get a 10% discount on their order by placing the coupon code on the website.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECoupon Codes. “Hot Coupon” gives the customers a full $5 off on their order. The discount can be availed by placing the coupon code on the website.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/07\/Petsupplies.net-Reviews-3.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Petsupplies.net Reviews 3\u0022 width=\u0022752\u0022 height=\u0022147\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10934\u0022 \/\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThere is a large variety of drugs available on the website. The layout is also pretty neat with some good quality pictures. The shipping cost and the pricing of the products is one of the lowest out of all the online drugs for pets. Although, the website does not provide its customers with a variety of communication mediums, it still gives them an active e-mail service that responds back within 24 hours and a form that lets the consumers inquire about their orders. Almost all the meds are available on the front page of the website, which makes it easier for customers to for the one they wish to buy. As far as its legitimacy of this online drugs store is concerned, the website is considered as rogue, which puts a lot of question marks on its reputation. Also, the fact that there have been no reviews about the website for the last three years further creates a doubt whether the pharmacy is legit anymore. Considering these two factors, the website goes down on the ratings and gets a total of 3 stars out of 5.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() { var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/petsupplies.net\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E3\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. Some of the medicines listed on the website offers defense against chronic diseases as we age.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the website are also very competitive if not the lowest in the market. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/safe-online-pharmacy-reviews-most-affordable-option-for-generics-ed-but-suspicious\/","title":"Safe-online-pharmacy Reviews – Most Affordable Option for Generics ED but Suspicious","url":"http:\/\/safe-online-pharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Safe-online-pharmacy.com-Review-880x320-1431705578.jpg","annotation":"Safe Online Pharmacy is a 7 years old online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs to their worldwide customers. Their best selling products are generic ED drugs like Vaigra, Cialis, Kamagra and more but customers can also find other drugs under different product categories like Allergies, Depression, Hair Loss, Pain Relief, Weight Loss, Women’s Health and many more. All of their listed generics are manufactured at Indian pharmacies and approved by Indian FDA.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESafe Online Pharmacy is a 7 years old online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs to their worldwide customers. Their best selling products are generic ED drugs like Vaigra, Cialis, Kamagra and more but customers can also find other drugs under different product categories like Allergies, Depression, Hair Loss, Pain Relief, Weight Loss, Women’s Health and many more. All of their listed generics are manufactured at Indian pharmacies and approved by Indian FDA.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the online pharmacy are lowest customers can find anywhere on the internet. Generic Viagra is available for only $0.44 per pill that is almost half the price of actual wholesale price. Generic Viagra is mostly sold at $1.1 to $0.67 at other online pharmacies that makes safe-online-pharmacy one of the cheapest online source for generic ED pills. Similarly, Cialis is available for only $0.91 per pill.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact their support through their phone numbers, email and online form. Payment options are currently limited to only visa credit cards. The website offers free reshipment or refund of money in case of lost shipment. The website claims to be approved by CIPA (Certified Canadian International Pharmacy), CPA and MIPA.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESafe-online-pharmacy.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback and online reviews are not available anywhere on the internet. This indicates that the online pharmacy is not popular among customers and not many people are buying from them to share their experiences. The only form of online feedback is available in the form of testimonials posted on their own website. But the similar testimonials are available on few other online pharmacies which show that the online pharmacy is a part of a network that is using the same set of testimonials on all of their websites. This makes this testimonials unreliable and unworthy to base our rating on.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Safe-online-pharmacy.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Safe-online-pharmacy.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10745\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll of the listed reviews are just a note of thanks about delivered orders without much value and feedback about their quality, customer service and other services.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to lack of reviews, trust rating from scam alert websites is also very low that makes them very risky website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Safe-online-pharmacy.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Safe-online-pharmacy.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10746\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store is also listed as rogue pharmacy by legitscript.com for not meeting the online pharmacy verification standards. The online store offers free airmail shipping on all orders above $200 and free courier shipping for all orders above $300.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EED Trial Packs. Customers can buy ED trial packs on discounted priced which allows them to try different variety of ED drugs like Viagra, Cialis and Levitra without paying separately for them.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree ED Pills. The online store also offered 2 free ED pills on all orders.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECoupon Codes. The online pharmacy is also listed as rogue with low trust rating from scam alert websites. The products are also only Indian FDA approved and delivered directly from India without going through a check from US FDA or other authorities that makes them unsafe for health. The prices are rock bottom and it is hard to find other cheaper sources than them. The online pharmacy also allows customers to buy listed drugs and medicines from their online store making it convenient for customers from other parts of the world to buy from them. The online store is not only a pharmacy, but it also sells products under other categories that include Food \u0026amp; Home, Beauty and Financial Services.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe company was established 50 years ago in the field of medicine and enjoys a great reputation among its customers and medical industry. The listed drugs and medicines are from high quality renowned brands. It offers financial services to customers in alliance with RBC bank.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe healthcare products listed on the online pharmacy includes supplements, natural and herbal items, vitamin based products, drinks, moisture and lubricants for sexual wellbeing, family planning products and many other items. The website also offers 100% satisfaction guarantee on their products.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe products offered by the drugstore are available at affordable prices. The online store also has established pharmacies in almost every province of Canada where customers can find services at highly affordable prices. The online store offers all major credit cards for payments.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EShoppersdrugmart.ca Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online feedback and customer reviews are readily available about the pharmacy which reflects that the online store is a popular pharmacy for customers. For example, customers can make use of the $5 discount deals on gift cards.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003ELive Coupon Codes. It is attractive, contains tons of useful features for customers and all the necessary information on health topics and drugs. On the other hand, product range is also impressive while customer feedback is also great. The only worrying part is lack of reviews about their online store, but there are many reviews available about their stores located in Toronto and other Canadian cities. All in all, the online pharmacy looks like a genuine option for North American customers and earned 4 out 5 star rating. We recommend customers to buy from this store as it looks like a quality and legitimate online option for medicines.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/shoppersdrugmart.ca\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E4\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/rightsourcerx-reviews-a-genuine-online-service-but-with-negative-online-reputation\/","title":"Rightsourcerx Reviews – A Genuine Online Service but with Negative Online Reputation","url":"http:\/\/rightsourcerx.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Rightsourcerx.com-Review-880x320-1431704948.jpg","annotation":"RightSource is a US based online pharmacy and an online prescription service that allows users to consult a pharmacist online and can get their prescribed drugs at their footsteps without going to pharmacy. The online pharmacy offers both specialty and maintenance medicines to their customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy works in few simple steps. Customers can fill their prescription online using a form after signing up with the online service. The website will create an online profile of the user with a trackable id for user’s order. In the following step, a pharmacist checks the prescription to see if the drugs are according to your health profile. After approval, the order is processed and forwarded to pharmacy where it is checked again by another pharmacist for accuracy of shipped drugs and user’s prescription. After state-of-the art bottle protection and packaging, the drugs are shipped to the desired address of the customer.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ETo learn more about their services, customers can call their US and Canada based numbers. Customers can pay for their monthly membership according to their needs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERightsourcerx.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is available in bulk which means many customers are using their services, but the online reputation is below average. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/private-pharmacy-reviews-caution-is-required-as-online-pharmacy-is-new\/","title":"Private Pharmacy Reviews – Caution is Required as Online Pharmacy is New","url":"http:\/\/privatepharmacy.net","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Privatepharmacy.net-Review-880x320-1431703732.jpg","annotation":"Privatepharmacy.net is a domain name that represents Pharmaplax, an online pharmacy that sells generic drugs to their customers in North America and other parts of the world. All the ordered generics are shipped from Indian and manufactured at licensed Indian pharmacies. The listed generics are also approved by Indian FDA. Their featured products are ED and sexual health related but customers can also find other generics related to other medical conditions like Asthma, Obesity, Skin Care, Eye Care, Diabetes, General Health, HIV and many more. Their product range allows customers to get all their medical supplies from one source.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPrivatepharmacy.net is a domain name that represents Pharmaplax, an online pharmacy that sells generic drugs to their customers in North America and other parts of the world. All the ordered generics are shipped from Indian and manufactured at licensed Indian pharmacies. The listed generics are also approved by Indian FDA. Their featured products are ED and sexual health related but customers can also find other generics related to other medical conditions like Asthma, Obesity, Skin Care, Eye Care, Diabetes, General Health, HIV and many more. Their product range allows customers to get all their medical supplies from one source.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered at the website are also market competitive if not the lowest. For example, Viagra is available for $0.97 per pill but there are other online sources that are selling for as low as $0.69 per pill. Cialis is available for $1.38 while Brand Viagra is available for $6.84. The website also hosts a blog with useful articles and information about the listed products and health conditions.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can talk to their customer support through their toll free phone number, live chat or email. Customers can order their products through EMS or Airmail Shipping options. After shipment, customers can have their tracking number in their email that allows them to track their orders online. The online store accepts all major credit cards and e-checks as payment options.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPrivatepharmacy.net Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to the online tracking websites, the online pharmacy is just 1 year old that makes them a new but less reliable option for customers as online feedback and reviews are not available anywhere on the internet. According to one scam alert website, there is a high probability that the online pharmacy is operated from Fiji instead of United States.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs customer feedback on third party review websites is not available with a moderate feedback from scam alert websites, it is difficult to comment about their quality and services. Customers dealing with any diseases can discuss their symptoms and ask solutions online from medical and health experts, using this online platform.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWebMD has a large network that includes Medspace, Medspace Reference, MedicineNet, eMedicineHealth, RxList and many others, It has also introduced different apps to facilitate patients in maintaining their health. These apps include WebMD Mobile, WebMD App, Pregnancy, Baby. Allergy, Pain Coach and few other. The medical and health website offers valuable information over drugs and supplements. Customers can use its services to identify the ingredients of the medicines they are using. Customers can also sign up for WebMD mymedicine in order to get FDA alerts, create profile and learn from experts.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EReaders and WebMD members can contact the website by sending an email, or use their online form. The online drugstore offers medicines, health products, OTC drugs, prescription refills and health advices to its customers throughout the world. In 2015, Walgreens pharmacy launched a new online tool that will help customers to design weekly plan to stay fit and healthy.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWalgreens pharmacy is a US based online pharmacy owned by Walgreen Co. The online drugstore offers medicines, health products, OTC drugs, prescription refills and health advices to its customers throughout the world. In 2015, Walgreens pharmacy launched a new online tool that will help customers to design weekly plan to stay fit and healthy.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe company offers prescription refills online. Customers can order refills from their accounts, they can chose give RX refill number, and manage their auto refills. Other than refills, there are other pharmacy services including pharmacy chat, family prescription, reminders for Rx refills, medication compounding and much more. Customers can also see their health dashboard, check appointments, visit healthcare clinics, and find other information related to their health.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy offers a wide range of products divided into different categories. Some of the categories include persona care, beauty, medication and treatments, diet and fitness, natural and organic supplements and more. The online pharmacy offers health products at affordable prices. For example, Wal-zyr 10mg tablets pack is available for $19.99 with $12 discount.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy accepts payment via credit card, debit card, Discover Network, American Express, PayPal and BillMeLater. The pharmacy offers standard and expedited shipping and customers can get free shipping on order $20 or more. Customers can return the products to nearby Walgreens store or via USPS.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWalgreens Pharmacy Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWalgreens is one of the leading stores in the United States. The customer didn’t mention anything about the online service, but his review indicates that the company is reliable and in operation.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10846\u0022 src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Walgreens-Pharmacy-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Walgreens Pharmacy Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAnother customer complained that Walgreens pharmacy provided short prescription. Even though, the doctor called and verified the prescription, the store did not cooperate with the customer.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10849\u0022 src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Walgreens-Pharmacy-Reviews-20152.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Walgreens Pharmacy Reviews 20152\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn the other hand, one of the satisfied customers said Walgreens has the best pharmacists. There is no coupon code associated with this deal.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWalgreens is United States’ premier departmental store with increased supply of medicines and health supplements. However, none of them seems dissatisfied with the quality of products, and they also haven’t mentioned anything against online pharmacy. It indicated that the online pharmacy is a safe option. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/secure-canadian-pharmacy-reviews-lowest-possible-generic-prices-but-suspicious-online-pharmacy\/","title":"Secure-canadian-pharmacy Reviews – Lowest Possible Generic Prices but Suspicious Online Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/secure-canadian-pharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/noscreen2-880x320-1432101251.png","annotation":"Secure-canadian-pharmacy.com is one of the domains used by “Online Pharmacy” that sells generic and brand name drugs to their worldwide customers. Use of multiple domains like safe-online-pharmacy.com which represents the same online pharmacy indicates that it is operated by the same network that operates from Eastern Europe. The online pharmacy claims to be approved by CIPA (Certified Canadian International Pharmacy), CPA and MIPA.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESecure-canadian-pharmacy.com is one of the domains used by “Online Pharmacy” that sells generic and brand name drugs to their worldwide customers. Use of multiple domains like safe-online-pharmacy.com which represents the same online pharmacy indicates that it is operated by the same network that operates from Eastern Europe. The online pharmacy claims to be approved by CIPA (Certified Canadian International Pharmacy), CPA and MIPA.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ETheir best selling and featured products are generic ED drugs like Vaigra, Cialis, Levitra and more but customers can also find other drugs under different product categories like Allergies, Depression, Hair Loss, Pain Relief, Weight Loss, Women’s Health and many more. All of their listed generics are manufactured at licensed Indian pharmacies and approved by Indian FDA before shipment.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the online pharmacy are lowest customers can find anywhere on the internet. Generic Viagra is available for only $0.44 per pill that is almost half the price of actual wholesale price. Generic Viagra is mostly sold at $1.1 to $0.67 at other online pharmacies that makes safe-online-pharmacy one of the cheapest online source for generic ED pills. Similarly, Cialis is available for only $0.91 per pill. Customers can contact their support through their phone numbers, email and online form. Payment options are currently limited to only visa credit cards. The website offers free reshipment or refund of money in case of lost shipment.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESecure-canadian-pharmacy.com Review\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback and online reviews are difficult to find anywhere on the internet. For an online store that claims to be in business for last 7 years, lack of customer reviews on independent sources indicates that not many people are buying from the store. The feedback is available only in the form of testimonials posted on their own website that are moderated for content so they cannot be trusted. On the other hand, the same set of testimonials are posted on few other similar online pharmacies which indicates that the same web content is used on multiple websites operated by same network working from Eastern Europe, a place known for hosting scam websites. This makes the testimonials unreliable as well as makes the online store suspicious.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Secure-canadian-pharmacy.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Secure-canadian-pharmacy.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10833\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe fact that the online store uses different domain names for same website also indicates that the online pharmacy is suspicious as most websites switch domain names when they are blacklisted by authorities. Rating from scam alert websites is also very low for legitimacy and trustworthiness.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, based on the poor online reputation, the online pharmacy is not recommended to users and customers are advised to\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESecure-canadian-pharmacy.com Reviews 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn 2015, customer feedback and online reviews are still not available on any review website or forum except of its low trust rating on scam alert websites and its presence among the rogue pharmacies at Legit Script.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESource: \u003Ca href=\u0022http:\/\/www.legitscript.com\/pharmacy\/secure-canadian-pharmacy.com\u0022 onclick=\u0022_gaq.push([\u0027_trackEvent\u0027, \u0027outbound-article\u0027, \u0027http:\/\/www.legitscript.com\/pharmacy\/secure-canadian-pharmacy.com\u0027, \u0027http:\/\/www.legitscript.com\/pharmacy\/secure-canadian-pharmacy.com\u0027]);\u0022 \u003Ehttp:\/\/www.legitscript.com\/pharmacy\/secure-canadian-pharmacy.com\u003C\/a\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Secure-canadian-pharmacy.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Secure-canadian-pharmacy.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10834\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy is listed among rogue pharmacy by Legit Script as it fails to meet the verification standards set by US authorities for online pharmacies. As customer feedback is not available to verify its services and quality, we cannot trust the all positive testimonials as rating from scam alert websites is extremely low. All in all, the online store is not recommended.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ESecure-canadian-pharmacy.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEven though, the prices offered by the online pharmacy are rock bottom, but the online store also offers wide range of other discounts to help customers save more while shopping from the website. Listed are some of their popular deals.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Shipping. The online store allows customers to use both shipping options for free. The online store offers free airmail shipping on all orders above $200 and free courier shipping for all orders above $300.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EED Trial Packs. Customers can buy ED trial packs on discounted priced which allows them to try different variety of ED drugs like Viagra, Cialis and Levitra without paying separately for them.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree ED Pills. The online store also offered 2 free ED pills of their choice (Viagra, Cialis, Levitra) on all orders irrespective of order quantity.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECoupon Codes. Live coupon codes are currently not available but customers can check back later.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThere is no genuine feedback available for the online store but it is clear that the online pharmacy is part of a network of similar pharmacies as they all use similar website content. The online pharmacy is also listed as rogue with low trust rating from Legit Script and scam alert websites. The products are only approved by Indian FDA and delivered directly from India without going through a check from US FDA or other authorities that makes them unsafe for health. The prices are lowest possible as it is difficult to find other cheaper sources than them. All in all, the website is not safe for financial transactions and we advise customers to choose other more recognized online pharmacies. Their featured and best selling drugs are all related to ED and Sexual Health but customers can find range of other product categories on their homepage. The generics listed on their website are all manufactured at licensed Indian pharmacies that are also FDA approved. The orders are also shipped directly from India after going through quality check. Their featured and best selling drugs are all related to ED and Sexual Health but customers can find range of other product categories on their homepage. Some of their other popular product categories include Blood Pressure, Asthma, hair Loss, Hormones, Pain Relief, Quit Smoking, etc.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than their wide product range, the online store also offers rock bottom prices that are hard to match by other online pharmacies. For example, Viagra is available for only $0.75 that is cheaper than retail price but there are few other online sources where you can find Viagra for as low as $0.69 per pill. Similarly, Cialis is available for $1.07 per pill while Levitra is available for $1.79 per pill.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store offers 5 different shipping options for customers to choose from. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/rx-med-reviews-suspicious-online-pharmacy\/","title":"Rx-med Reviews – Suspicious Online Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/rx-med.net","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Rx-med.net-Review-880x320-1432054625.jpg","annotation":"Rx-med.com is a domain that represents Pharmacy Online, an online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs for ED and other health conditions. All the listed generics are approved by Indian FDA and manufactured by licensed Indian based pharmacies. All the orders are also shipped directly from India. Some of their popular product categories beside their featured ED and Sexual Health products are Alcoholism, Arthritis, Eye Care, Skin Care, Weight Loss, Women’s Health and many more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERx-med.com is a domain that represents Pharmacy Online, an online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs for ED and other health conditions. All the listed generics are approved by Indian FDA and manufactured by licensed Indian based pharmacies. All the orders are also shipped directly from India. Generic Viagra is available for only $0.69 pr pill that is cheaper than the actual wholesale price. Generic Levitra is offered for only $1.50 per pill while generic Amoxil is available for only $0.44.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe content of website is similar to many other online pharmacies which indicate that the online pharmacy is a part of network that is operated from Russia. Customer service is reachable through phone contacts, email and live chat. Customers can choose between Express International Mail and Standard International Airmail as shipping method. The first one costs $30 and delivers within 5 to 9 days with tracking id to track order online. Customers can pay through all popular credit cards.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERx-med.net Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback is not available on any of the review website and forums. The same testimonials are posted on many other similar websites that are operated by one network that operates from Russia. Most of the websites and online pharmacies operated by this network are fake and scams that makes these testimonials useless to base our rating on.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe testimonials are all positive, but as they are the same set of testimonials used on at last 10 more websites, the genuineness of these testimonials seems untrue.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Rx-med.net-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Rx-med.net Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10825\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe domain is still just 7 months old, the reason scam alert and other websites provide inconclusive trust rating about them but rate them suspicious due to their young age and their operation from Russia that is often rated as high risk country for online pharmacies as lot of fake\/fraudulent pharmacies work from Russia and Eastern Europe.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, the online reputation of the website is not good beside the fact that it is only 7 months old. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/rite-aid-reviews-a-legitimate-pharmacy-service-with-poor-online-reputation\/","title":"Rite Aid Reviews – A Legitimate Pharmacy Service with Poor Online Reputation","url":"http:\/\/riteaid.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Riteaid.com-Review-880x320-1431658985.jpg","annotation":"Rite Aid is a US based online service that offers monthly paid subscription to their customers to get their prescribed medicines at affordable prices. They also offer an interactive Wellness program along with many other-than-drugs products that falls under the category of wellness. They also offer photo products and services like photo books, gifts, motion products, calendars and more. The online store also represents number of stores situated in different cities of United States.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERite Aid is a US based online service that offers monthly paid subscription to their customers to get their prescribed medicines at affordable prices. They also offer an interactive Wellness program along with many other-than-drugs products that falls under the category of wellness. They also offer photo products and services like photo books, gifts, motion products, calendars and more. The online store also represents number of stores situated in different cities of United States.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy allows customers to chat with the pharmacist online to discuss their health condition and prescription. They offer multiple other services like RX Reminders, Get Immunized, Transfer a prescription, Refill a Prescription, RediClinic and many more online services to provide convenience to customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact their support through their live chat option, phone contact, email and their social media platforms. Customers can also download their mobile app. All in all, the online pharmacy is more than just a pharmacy as it offers lot of other products that allows customers to get lot of stuff under one roof.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERiteaid.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online customer reviews are readily available about the Rite Aid, for both their physical stores and online stores that indicates that many people are their customers. On the other hand, almost all available feedback is negative about them and it is difficult to find a single praise. According to one customer Anne, she is customer of Rite Aid for last 10 years, but she still has to call them 3 to 5 times every month in order to remind them about her order as they often forget to send her medication that are for pain relief and can left her in severe pain if not send in time. Her exact words and question about them was, “How is possible that they screw up this script at least half of the year???”\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Riteaid.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Riteaid.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10686\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe main complaint was related to their customer service and incompetence. Most customers complained that they have to call multiple times to make sure they get their orders right. Customer service is also not friendly and often not helpful.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to one customer, Rosa who rated the online pharmacy 1 out of 5, they are very incompetent. She was offered a lotion coupon but when she tried to utilize the coupon, the lotion was not available on their store. The Canadian association is a non-profit organization established in 1907 to provide pharmacists with information, tools and other resources to help them focus on better patient care. The association claims to be the national voice for Canadian pharmacists. The goal and mission of the association is to advance well-being and health of Canadians through excellence and betterment in pharmacist care. The website also offers limited number of drug \u0026amp; therapeutic products for their members which include compendium of products for minor ailments, compendium of therapeutic choices, e-Therapeutics+ and many more. The e-suit of CPS is also available at an affordable price of $349.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacits.ca is a website that represents Canadian Pharmacists Association (CPhA) online. The Canadian association is a non-profit organization established in 1907 to provide pharmacists with information, tools and other resources to help them focus on better patient care. The association claims to be the national voice for Canadian pharmacists. The goal and mission of the association is to advance well-being and health of Canadians through excellence and betterment in pharmacist care. The website also offers limited number of drug \u0026amp; therapeutic products for their members which include compendium of products for minor ailments, compendium of therapeutic choices, e-Therapeutics+ and many more. The e-suit of CPS is also available at an affordable price of $349.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadian Pharmacists Association also offers reference services, education services and organizes events for its members. Among its education services, the association offers skill development courses in lab tests, patient care, medication review services, diabetes tools and practice and smoking cessation programs. Members may also have an access to therapeutic content and other integrated solutions on the website. Apart from these products and services, the association also provides practice tools, professional development programs and critical information necessary for pharmacists or for those who are interested in pharmacy business.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EInterested people can contact via call, fax or send an email or post a letter to the association.
