{"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/qualitydrugstorenow-com-reviews-low-cost-drugs-but-listed-as-rogue-pharmacy\/","title":"Qualitydrugstorenow.com Reviews – Low Cost Drugs but Listed as Rogue Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/qualitydrugstorenow.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Qualitydrugstorenow.com-Review-880x320-1431658376.jpg","annotation":"Quality Drugstore is an online source of generic drugs especially for treatment of ED and other sexual health issues. The listed generics at the store are manufactured at Indian pharmacies, approved by Indian FDA and are delivered directly from India to the country from where drugs are ordered. The online store offers free shipping to all over the world through EMS and standard airmail delivery.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EQuality Drugstore is an online source of generic drugs especially for treatment of ED and other sexual health issues. The listed generics at the store are manufactured at Indian pharmacies, approved by Indian FDA and are delivered directly from India to the country from where drugs are ordered. The online store offers free shipping to all over the world through EMS and standard airmail delivery.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the store are very affordable and rock bottom. The price of Viagra is jus $0.69 per pill that makes it one of the cheapest online options for drugs. Generic Cialis is available for just $1.30 while generic Levitra is available for $1.50. Other than ED pills, the website also sells Birth Control, Blood Pressure, Weight Loss, Eye Care, Skin Care and many other drugs listed under different health conditions.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can talk to their support for more information through their email, live chat and toll free phone contacts. The website currently accepts only Visa credit and debit cards for payments. Customers can also track their orders online.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EQualitydrugstorenow.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is only available in the form of their own testimonials on their website that is also moderated. Other than that, no review or feedback about them is available on any third party review website or forum. Testimonials are all positive as they are moderated and updated after the approval of their own staff, so anything negative is more unlikely to get its place on their website, this is why we cannot base our final ratings only on the testimonials on their own website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Qualitydrugstorenow.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Qualitydrugstorenow.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10683\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to the tracking websites, the online store is just two years old. Lack of customer reviews indicates that the online store is not popular yet and not many people are buying from them.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Qualitydrugstorenow.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Qualitydrugstorenow.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10684\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to the legitscript.com, Qualitydrugstorenow.com is rated as rogue pharmacy as it does not meet pharmacy verification standards. The website rated the online pharmacy as risk for health and finances.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EScam alert websites have also rated it negatively for trust and legitimacy. According to scamadviser.com, the online store is a high risk online store and unsafe for financial transactions. The reasons listed for high risk includes host server that also hosts many other scam websites, operating from Eastern European high risk country and lower trustworthiness and reliability rating from other online sources.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, based on the scam alert ratings and lack of genuine customer feedback, the website is not safe to do business with.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EQualitydrugstorenow.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe picture is no different in 2014 and 2015 as there are no reviews available on any other third part review website. The only feedback is available in the form of testimonials on their own website. Most of the testimonials are just a note of thanks in which customers claimed that they received their orders in time. These similar testimonials are also present on some other similar online pharmacies which show that the pharmacy is part of a network that is using same set of testimonials on all of their websites. This makes these testimonials very unreliable.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Qualitydrugstorenow.com-Reviews-2014-2015.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Qualitydrugstorenow.com Reviews 2014 2015\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10685\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EScam alert ratings and other online feedback remains negative in last couple of years. All the drugs are approved and verified by India FDA and delivered to customers through licensed Indian manufacturers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their wide product options, the prices listed are also very competitive but not the lowest available on online pharmacies. For example, generic Viagra is available for just $1.05 per pill but few online pharmacies are selling generic Viagra for as low as $0.56. Generic Cialis is available for just $1.68 per pill that may be lower than retail price but cheaper online options are also available. On the other hand, the website offers 10% discount on the price offered by any other online pharmacy.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online store offers 24\/7 customer service through their two North American and Europe based phone contacts, emails and email order. Available payment options include Visa, American Express and MasterCard credit cards. Customers can order and get their medicines without any need of prescription.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENo Rx PharmStore is an online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs related to different health conditions to their worldwide customers at affordable prices. The online store offers ED and sexual health drugs as their featured products but an array of other drugs are also listed under different categories like Antibiotics, Antivirals, Diabetes, Hypertension, Migraine, Weight Loss and many more. Customers can order and get their medicines without any need of prescription.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the online pharmacy are among the lowest available on internet. For example, generic Viagra is available for $0.69 that is much cheaper than actual retail price of $0.9 to $1.1. Generic Cialis is available for only $1.3 while generic Levitra is available for $1.5 that are also cheaper than actual retail price in market.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can pay through all common credit cards like Visa, MasterCard and Amex. Customer service is reachable through online form, email, live chat and phone contacts with a toll free number. All the listed generics on the online pharmacy are manufactured at the licensed Indian manufacturers and all the manufactured drugs are approved by Indian FDA before shipment to customers. Shipping is available for customers from all over the world through two different shipping methods including free airmail shipping. Customers can also track their shipped orders on the store’s website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENorxpharmstore.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback and online reviews are very limited on the internet. The only form of customer feedback is in the form of testimonials available on their own website that could be biased as it is moderated by their own staff. Customers are advised to stay away and buy their medications from other trusted online stores rated positively on our website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENorxpharmstore.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EJust like previous years, customer reviews are not available except on their own website in the form of testimonials. The prices offered are very attractive and rock bottom, but lack of customer feedback make it difficult to comment about their quality. Scam alert websites also rated the online pharmacy as suspicious that makes it hard to recommend this website to customers even when they offer rock bottom prices and a wide range of products. If you find their prices attractive, you can buy from them on your own risk but we rate them 3 out of 5.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/norxpharmstore.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E3\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/noprescription-online-pharmacy-reviews-pharmacy-or-a-rip-off\/","title":"Noprescription-online-pharmacy Reviews – Pharmacy or a Rip Off","url":"http:\/\/noprescription-online-pharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com-Review-880x320-1431070389.jpg","annotation":"“NoPrescription Online Pharmacy” is a place to find generic medications online. The company claims to follow Drugs and Cosmetics Act of India 1940.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E“NoPrescription Online Pharmacy” is a place to find generic medications online. The online pharmacy was created 9 years ago. It offers a wide range of medicines that are being manufactured in and shipped from India. The company claims to follow Drugs and Cosmetics Act of India 1940.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe range of medicines is quite large, customers can find medicines for almost every health issue. Some of the medicines include anti-allergies, anti-viral, antibiotics, migraine treatment, obesity treatment, cancer medicines, diabetic medicines, ED medicines and many others. ED pills have been the top selling products on the website, with generic Viagra being no.1 product. The online pharmacy makes sure customers get low prices and high quality generic products. For example, a pill of generic Viagra is available for as low as $0.69. Other than low prices, customers can get more discounts on the website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy provides order tracking facility to its customers. Beside that, customers can contact the representatives and talk to them over the phone. For long and detailed queries, customers can send email directly to the company, or they can forward their queries through online support form available on the website. Shipping takes 10 – 17 days. Customers can cancel their orders within 24 hours of order placement. The company also refunds the whole amount if the customers are not satisfied and intends to return it.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENoprescription-online-pharmacy.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E“NoPrescription Online Pharmacy” may be in the business for 9 years or more, it hasn’t been able to get any positive customer reviews. The independent review and scam alert report make the pharmacy website less reliable.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENoprescription-online-pharmacy.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENormally, businesses face trouble during early stages and become stable with the passage of time. That could be the case with this Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com well. Therefore, we tried to investigate further in order to find latest customer reviews, a good review would definitely help. However, the search was wasted as the website doesn’t show any improvement. In fact, SiteJabbar indicated that this online pharmacy never responded to any bad customer review. This makes it more certain that Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com is not meant for fair business.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ENoprescription-online-pharmacy.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy has a lot of products at highly affordable prices. To attract more customers, the website offers many other things, as mentioned below:\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Pills: Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com offers free pills with specific orders. Customers can get as many as 20 Viagra pills with their purchases.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EDiscounts: The online pharmacy offers 5% discounts to those customers who order for the second time. Customers ordering for the third time are entitled to receive 7% discount on their orders. Moreover, customers who told their friends about the website will receive up to 10% discount on their purchases.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Shipping: The online pharmacy also offers free shipping on specific orders. Customers can avail free standard shipping on orders over $150.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECoupon codes and other special deals are not available at the moment. Interested customers may talk to the representatives and get updates of discounts to come in near future.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EWith all exciting promotions, engaging deals and attractive prices Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com appears to be a great website, but wait. The online pharmacy has not been able to receive any positive independent customer review except for one eye opener. Scam alert websites have indicated that Noprescription-online-pharmacy.com has unlawful practices and customers should stay away from it. Based on our finding, customers are advised not to trust the website. For example, generic Lamivudine\/Zidovudine 150mg\/300mg is available in a pack of 60 pills at $192.59. The online pharmacy offers lowest price guarantee for all medicines. Customer will also get satisfaction guarantee on every order.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can get in touch with the Canadian pharmacy via toll free number, or they can also send fax to the pharmacy. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/mydrugstore-reviews-a-pharmacy-website-that-actually-doesnt-sell-anything\/","title":"Mydrugstore Reviews – A Pharmacy Website that Actually Doesn’t Sell Anything","url":"http:\/\/mydrugstore.org","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Mydrugstore.org-Review-880x320-1431059243.jpg","annotation":"My Drug Store is an online platform that offers information about medicines and treatments for different kinds of health issues. The website isn’t a direct seller or medical products, its purpose is to give customers a range of medicines and direct them to online pharmacies to purchase them.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMy Drug Store is an online platform that offers information about medicines and treatments for different kinds of health issues. The website isn’t a direct seller or medical products, its purpose is to give customers a range of medicines and direct them to online pharmacies to purchase them.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe range of medicines and treatments pertain with antibiotics, antidepressants, birth control, headache, men’s health, motion sickness, weight loss, erectile dysfunction, and much more. Customers can choose the required category, select the medicine they intend to buy and click on “Purchase” option besides the strength and price. The website will redirect them to the pharmacy to purchase their selected medicines.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPrices offered by the website are quite within the range of customers. For example, generic Cialis 20mg pills are available at a rate of $36.99 for 10 pills. Customers can buy up to 90 pills for $192.99.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBelow the product, the website displays its description, manufacturer’s details, active ingredients and the manner in which it must be taken. All shipments and assistance is provided by the concerned online pharmacies where the products are bought. Some of the pharmacies include rxmop.com, drugstore-checkout.com, and pharma-checkout.com etc.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMydrugstore.org Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMy Drugstore does not have any platform where customers can write their reviews. As we know that satisfaction of the customers is the most important for any business entity, the lack of testimonials may be a worrying factor for this website.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EResponse from customers not only helps measure the nature of company’s dealings, but also helps them gauge the popularity of the company. Mydrugstore.org appears to be untraceable in the data offered by legit.com.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIt could be due to the fact that the company is yet to be completely registered with various relevant authorities. But, the lack of data on Legit.com does not translate into the notion that this online pharmacy may be illegal. According to scamadviser.com, My Drugstore seems to be located in the United States. However, that there are additional countries drawn in.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EUpon checking the website on scam alert sites, such as scamvoid.com, it was found that the website doesn’t offer any threat to customers. As a matter of fact, My Drugstore has a good online popularity and vendor reliability as well. Having mentioned that, customers are required to evaluate this data cautiously and decide whether it is as they anticipate. The site has as well been setup using a free email.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, the lack of customer reviews is always a worrying factor for a pharmacy website, as it is related to human health and wellbeing.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMydrugstore.org Review 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDuring 2014\/2015, there seems to be no improvement in the business in terms of marketing. Customers have not been too keen to review the website on any independent forum. As there are no evidences online, the website looks rather unreliable to have business with.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMydrugstore.org Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMy Drugstore is a platform that provides medicines from various online pharmacies. Since, it doesn’t sell anything directly, customers cannot find any deals and discounts on the website. Only opportunity to save for the customers arises when they opt to purchase larger quantities. However, the online pharmacies that are linked with this website may offer certain discounts and special deals to the customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFor example, Zyban 150 mg pill helps reduce smoking and can be used by people who want to quit smoking. The medicine is available on Pharma Checkout, linked with My Drugstore, at a discounted price of $97.80 for 30 pills. Customers buying this medicine are entitled to receive free bonus pills as well. These pills are available at 10% discount.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMydrugstore.org is just a source of information on different kinds of medicines and their uses. It redirects customers to online pharmacies where they can buy what they intend for. However, the website does not have a good popularity, as there are no customer reviews available on the internet. Although, the website is not declared as spam, still there is too much ambiguity regarding its services and the products it displays. Since there is no point of contact for the customers to verify the authenticity of products and other service, the online pharmacy is not recommended to them. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/mypharmacyconnect-reviews-a-service-that-connects-patients-and-reliable-pharmacies\/","title":"Mypharmacyconnect Reviews – A Service That Connects Patients and Reliable Pharmacies","url":"http:\/\/mypharmacyconnect.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Mypharmacyconnect.com-Review-880x320-1431060645.jpg","annotation":"MyPharmacyConnect isn’t an online pharmacy to buy medicines. The US based website, that was created three years ago, is actually a service designed to provide easy access for customers to online pharmacies. It enables patients to connect with their pharmacies at their own schedule. It’s an app that allows patients to take care of their health.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMyPharmacyConnect isn’t an online pharmacy to buy medicines. The US based website, that was created three years ago, is actually a service designed to provide easy access for customers to online pharmacies. It enables patients to connect with their pharmacies at their own schedule. It’s an app that allows patients to take care of their health.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMyPharmacyConnect offers help in keeping up with health issues. Patients can sign up with this app and update their medical history online. The pharmacy service provider keeps all information confidential. All information is provided to the pharmacy of customers’ choice. The website allows patients to set reminders and alerts for medical examination and doctor appointments. It also helps keep track of refill prescription.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can also link their family members to their account so that a reminder can alert them of refills and doctor’s appointments. On behalf of the customer, myPharmacyConnect sends auto reminders to the concerned pharmacy. This feature is applied on regular refills.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMyPharmacyConnect helps save time customer waste to get their refills. The app has a Prescription Ready notification that updates a customer when his prescription is ready to be picked. In case, is customer forgets to pick any of his prescriptions, myPharmacyConnect sends an alert to him. Members will receive heldesk support to rectify problems in their profiles and account.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn the other hand, pharmacists can also register on the website and increase their availability. As a result, they can grow sales and expand their business.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMypharmacyconnect.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe US based website has a few customer reviews available in its testimonials. The reviews have been submitted by the users and pharmacists alike and all have been in favor of the website. According to pharmacies, the website is a good help to increase their customers, especially when there are too many fake pharmacies around.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to Kip C, the pharmacy gets 25% daily refills through myPharmacyConnect According to Don A. myPharmacyConnect is quite helpful and convenient as customers can get their refills on time and they don’t have to spend time waiting for their refills. According to Sam H, a pharmacists, mPC has helped them reduce their return to stock levels by 50%.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Mypharmacyconnect.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Mypharmacyconnect.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10551\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to Emily H. the website is quite easy to use. The process of registration and getting refills is quite easy and time saving for the customer.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Mypharmacyconnect.com-Reviews1.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Mypharmacyconnect.com Reviews1\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10552\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOn independent review sites, there hasn’t been any praises and complaints regarding myPharmacyConnect. While one might think that the website could use customer’s information to deceive them, but none of the incident has been reported ever since it was established. In order to get more about the website, scam alert reports are the best source. According to scam alert website, there is nothing doubtful about myPharmacyConnect and it looks quite popular among customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMypharmacyconnect.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs there are no independent customer reviews available on the internet, we cannot say whether the reviews available on myPharmacyConnect were submitted in 2014 or before that. However, the latest report from scam alert website indicated that the medical service has unknown trustworthiness. Here, it is worth mentioning that legitscrip.com hasn’t rate it as “rogue”. The website seems popular though.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMypharmacyconnect.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the myPharmacyConnect is only a service for patients and pharmacists, prices and discounts on products are out of question. Same is true for coupon codes. However, registration on the website is free.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EMypharmacyconnect.com is a helpful app that enables patients and pharmacists to connect with each other. The website allows patients to get timely refills from trustworthy sources. On the other hand pharmacies have been able to reduce their return on stock. There are no customer reviews about myPharmacyConnect elsewhere, other than the website. In the lights of these facts, it is advisable that customers should contact the representatives of the company and remove their doubts regarding quality of pharmacies and medicines, and the confidentiality of their medical profile. The website receives a rating of 3 out of 5.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/mypharmacyconnect.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E3\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/pharmamarketonlinenow-com-reviews-suspicious-online-pharmacy-with-low-trust-rating-and-lack-of-customer-feedback\/","title":"Pharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews – Suspicious Online Pharmacy with Low Trust Rating and Lack of Customer Feedback","url":"http:\/\/pharmamarketonlinenow.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmamarketonlinenow.com-Review-880x320-1431625481.jpg","annotation":"Pharma Market is a licensed online pharmacy that sells generics drugs related to ED and other health issues. All the listed generics at the online pharmacy are manufactured at renowned Indian manufacturers and approved by Indian FDA before shipment to customers. All orders are also processed and shipped directly from India. Their featured products are sexual health and ED related but customers can also shop under other product categories like Blood Pressure, Gums, Healthy Bones, Women’s Health, Weight Loss, Stop Smoking, Party Pills and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices listed on the online pharmacy are also very competitive if not the lowest. For example, generic Viagra is available for $0.89 that is cheaper than over-the-counter prices but lower prices are also available on few other online pharmacies. Cialis is available for $1.53 while Levitra is available for only $1.81 per pill.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy offers 100% money back guarantee and accepts all major credit and debit cards, Wire Transfer and Money Transfer for payment. Customer service is available through dedicated phone lines for US, UK and Australian customers along with email and online form. Customers can choose between EMS and regular airmail delivery options for shipment of their orders. EMS takes 10 days while airmail takes 21 to 28 days to deliver customer’s orders. Shipments are also trackable through tracking number.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOnline feedback and customer reviews are very limited about Pharma Market. The age of the website is also just 2 and a half years old that indicates the pharmacy is still new in the industry.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmamarketonlinenow.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Pharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10653\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to the scam alert websites, the online pharmacy is not a legit or trustworthy website to do business with. Customers are advised to buy from other trusted sources unless they read positive reviews about them on internet in future.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmamarketonlinenow.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs in past, customer feedback and online reviews are not available on the internet in 2014 and 2015 but only in the form of testimonials on their own website. Customers can get 1 air mile upon spending $15.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E• Deals: The pharmacy website displays special deals to offer more discount on purchases. Customers can register themselves with Rexall.ca and get coupon code notifications as they come.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThere are quite a few online coupons available on independent discount websites, but coupon codes are not available with them.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ERexall.ca offers convenience and satisfaction to the local customers. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/pharmacy-reviews-a-legal-option-for-canada-based-pharmacy\/","title":"Pharmacy Reviews – A Legal Option for Canada Based Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/pharmacy.ca","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmacy.ca-Review-880x320-1431624550.jpg","annotation":"Pharmacy.ca or Personalized Medicine is an online pharmacy based in province of Ontario, Canada and owned by PurePharm.Inc. The online Pharmacy is a licensed pharmacy that also operates as a retail pharmacy with an established shop for last 30 years at downtown Toronto. The website is also operated by a team of well experienced and qualified medical professionals. The online store sells an array of products under different product categories that include Arthritis, Hair Loss, Medical Tests, Allergy, Personal Care and many more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacy.ca or Personalized Medicine is an online pharmacy based in province of Ontario, Canada and owned by PurePharm.Inc. The online Pharmacy is a licensed pharmacy that also operates as a retail pharmacy with an established shop for last 30 years at downtown Toronto. The website is also operated by a team of well experienced and qualified medical professionals. The online store sells an array of products under different product categories that include Arthritis, Hair Loss, Medical Tests, Allergy, Personal Care and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered at the online store are also very competitive. For example, one of their featured products, Hydrosal Gel 15% 30ml is offered for only $19.99 at a special price. The actual price of the product is $20.79. Another of their featured product, Preparation H Cooling Gel 25g is offered for only $9.99. Even though, prescription is require for most of the orders but customers can also order without prescription for products listed under their non-prescription medicine category.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can contact their support through phone contact, email and online form. Customers can pay through Visa and MasterCard. The online store does not return and refund prescription drugs but non prescription drugs can be returned for refund. The shipping is available within Canada only and takes 2 to 5 business days to deliver orders.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacy.ca Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAs the online store caters to the needs of only Canadian based customers, their target market is very limited, one of the reasons of limited customer feedback about them on internet. Even though, the online feedback is limited and not available but the online store is not rated negatively by scam alert websites of LegitScript, a website that verify online pharmacies according to the set standards for online pharmacies.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThis indicates that the online pharmacy is a legitimate business, a licensed pharmacy with a verified address and head office based in Canada. The only drawback is it offers shipping to only Canada.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacy.ca Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is still limited in 2014 and 2015 but trust rating remained high in last couple of years. There is only one customer review available on Google reviews about them in 2014, posted 10 months ago by Lore Mallet who claimed that he is dealing with the online store for last 12 years, which indicates that the online pharmacy is offering its services for many years and also enjoys loyal following. The customer also praised their customer service and staff and rated them informative, accommodating and supportive. He also claimed that their delivery is always in time. All in all, the customer rated the pharmacy 5 out of 5.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Pharmacy.ca-Reviews-2014-2015.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Pharmacy.ca Reviews 2014 2015\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10650\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBased on their online reputation that is limited but all positive, Pharamcy.ca looks like a legitimate online option for customers based in Canada.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharmacy.ca Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than their affordable prices, the online store also offers few additional deals that allows customers to save more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cul style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cli\u003EFree Shipping: The online store offers free shipping on few of the listed products. For example, Villicote for IBD is offered with free shipping to Canada.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECurrent Deals: The website offers a link to “Current Deals” page on the website with a list of products that are available for special discounts. For example, Buckleys Mixture 200ml is currently available for $9.99 instead of $10.99 under the “Current Deals” offer.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003ECoupon Codes: It is hard to find any current active coupon code for the Phramacy.ca on any third party coupon website but customers can check back later.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003C\/ul\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAll in all, if compared to other online pharmacies, discount and additional offers listed on the store are limited\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EPharamcy.ca hosts two separate homepages, one as their online shop and other as personalized medicines page for customers that allows customers to become their members. The prices listed on the online store are also very affordable but the range of options is not as vast as offered by many other pharmacies. The online store attracted limited but positive online reputation with high trust rating and positive customer feedback. They are also listed as licensed Canada based pharmacy with head office situated in Toronto that makes them a legal online option. All in all, the online pharmacy is rated as 3 out of 5 star pharmacy which can be increased with more positive feedback and more product categories.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/pharmacy.ca\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E3\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. The Access Canada Drug Mart is a licensed Canadian pharmacy with its head office situated in Winnipeg, Canada. The website needs a valid prescription to process order after it is approved by the licensed physicians. Customers can order up to 3 months of supply of any medicine they want. Customers can search for their drugs by typing the name of the drug at search box or search under the alphabetical categories.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered by the online store are also very attractive other than their wide options of products. The price of 4 Viagra generic pills 56.50 that is comparatively higher than the price of generic drugs found on other online pharmacies selling generic drugs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can pay through credit cards, PayPal, international money order and personal checks. To connect with their customer support, customers can contact through phone, email, live chat and online form. For North American orders, the online pharmacy charges a flat rate of $13 while for other shipping costs $25 to other international destinations. Shipping takes 7 to 21 days based on the method of shipping selected. The online pharmacy does not accept returns on delivered products.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECanadadrugmart.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is not available anywhere on the internet about the pharmacy. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/drugs-in-canada-reviews-a-suspicious-online-pharmacy\/","title":"Drugs In Canada Reviews – A Suspicious Online Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/drugsincanada.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Drugsincanada.com-Review-880x320-1431603186.jpg","annotation":"Drugs in Canada is a Canadian based online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs to their worldwide customers. All the listed generics are manufactured at pharmacies in India and shipped directly to customers from their after approval from Indian FDA. The website offers ED and Sexual Health drugs as their featured products but customers can also shop under different other categories like Allergy, Arthritis, Blood Pressure, Cancer, Eye Drop, Herbals, Hair Loss, Weight Loss, Skin Care, Sleeping Aids and many more. The website also allows customers o buy drugs without any need of prescription.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugs in Canada is a Canadian based online pharmacy that sells wide range of generic drugs to their worldwide customers. All the listed generics are manufactured at pharmacies in India and shipped directly to customers from their after approval from Indian FDA. The website offers ED and Sexual Health drugs as their featured products but customers can also shop under different other categories like Allergy, Arthritis, Blood Pressure, Cancer, Eye Drop, Herbals, Hair Loss, Weight Loss, Skin Care, Sleeping Aids and many more. The website also allows customers o buy drugs without any need of prescription.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to their array of options that allows customers to buy all their medicines from one online source, the website also offers special and rock bottom prices on their listed generics. For example, Viagra is offered for as low as $0.74 per pill while Cialis is offered for only $1.05. The prices are not the lowest if compared to few other online pharmacies, but they are lower than the actual retail price.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website allows customers to reach their support through online chat, email, toll free phone contact and online form. The website also offers 5 different shipping methods to choose from and also allows customers to track their orders. Payment options include all major credit cards and e-checks.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugsincanada.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe only form of customer feedback and online reviews is available in the form of testimonials posted on their own website. Lack of customer reviews on the independent review websites or forums indicates that the online store is not a popular and recognized option among customers. The testimonials posted on the website are also in question as the same set of testimonials are posted on few other online pharmacies which indicates that the online pharmacy is part of a network of pharmacies operated by same people.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to lack of reviews, the online store also earned negative rating from scam alert websites from scam alert websites. According to Scam Adviser, the website uses the same server that is used by many scam and fraudulent websites. The location of the website is also based in Eastern Europe, a place where many scam pharmacies operates from.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/05\/Drugsincanada.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Drugsincanada.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10636\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EOther than lack of positive customer reviews and low trust rating from scam alert websites, the online pharmacy is also listed among Rogue pharmacies by Legit Script as it fails to meet the standards set for verification of online pharmacies.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EDrugsincanada.com Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online feedback and customer reviews are still hard to find in 2014 and 2015 which indicates that the online pharmacy is still not popular. The online pharmacy not only offers different ED trial packs on discounted prices, but it also offers free ED trail pack with every order that contains at least 120 ED pills.\u003C\/li\u003E \u003Cli\u003EDiscounts for Returning Customers. The online store was founded in 2004 and serving the customers in North America for last 11 years. It is also an accredited member of Certified Canadian International Pharmacies. The online store required a valid prescription from an authentic source to process the orders. The products are not listed under any category but customers can search the drug by typing the name in search box that look little inconvenient if compared to other online pharmacies.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website offers attractive prices on listed drugs as it claims to save 30% to 80% for the customers on prescription drugs. The brand name Viagra is available for $47 per 4 pills while the generic Viagra 100mg 4 pills are available for $14. Even though, these prices are competitive but customers can easily find generic Viagra at much cheaper price on other online sources.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EShipping charges within North America are $9.95 but all orders above $300 are shipped for free. Shipping is currently limited to only North America. Prices of these medicines are same for local and international customers alike.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EJan Drugs offers simple 3-step process to get discounted medications. New customers should consider scam alert reports indicating it as “rogue”. Therefore, the online pharmacy receives a rating of 1 out of 5. Even though, prices are very attractive but feedback can increase in future if we can find customer reviews about them on independent websites, review websites and forums with a better result on scam alert websites. But until then, stay away from the online store.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cscript type=\u0022text\/javascript\u0022\u003E\/\/ \u003C![CDATA[ jQuery( document ).ready(function() {  var myurl = \u0022http:\/\/health-tab.com\u0022; jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).css(\u0022margin-top\u0022, \u002220px\u0022).html(\u0027\u003Ca rel=\u0022nofollow\u0022 href=\u0022\u0027+ myurl +\u0027\u0022 target=\u0022_blank\u0022\u003E\u0027+ jQuery(\u0022.entry-title\u0022).text() +\u0027\u003C\/a\u003E\u0027); jQuery(\u0022.entry-meta\u0022).first().find(\u0022.entry-cats\u0022).find(\u0022.main-color-bg\u0022).css(\u0022padding\u0022, \u002210px 25px\u0022).find(\u0022a\u0022).attr(\u0022href\u0022, myurl).attr(\u0022target\u0022, \u0022_blank\u0022).text(\u0022Visit Site\u0022); jQuery(\u0022.review-container\u0022).remove(); }) \/\/ ]]\u0026gt;\u003C\/script\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cdiv itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Product\u0022 style=\u0022display:none;\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022name\u0022\u003ERxStars Review\u003C\/span\u003E - \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022review\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Review\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022reviewRating\u0022 itemscope itemtype=\u0022http:\/\/schema.org\/Rating\u0022\u003E\u003Cmeta itemprop=\u0022worstRating\u0022 content=\u00221\u0022\u003E\u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022ratingValue\u0022\u003E1\u003C\/span\u003E out of \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022bestRating\u0022\u003E5\u003C\/span\u003E stars\u003C\/span\u003E by \u003Cspan itemprop=\u0022author\u0022\u003ESam W. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/generic-top-pharmacy-com-reviews-rock-bottom-prices-but-risky-online-pharmacy\/","title":"Generic-top-pharmacy.com Reviews – Rock Bottom Prices but Risky Online Pharmacy","url":"http:\/\/generic-top-pharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/04\/Generic-top-pharmacy.com-Review-880x320-1429929373.jpg","annotation":"Generic-top-pharmacy.com is a domain name that represents a popular US based pharmacy known as Online Pharmacy. The online store sells generic drugs to their customers that are manufactured at the licensed Indian manufacturers and approved by Indian FDA for their quality. The featured products are ED drugs like Viagra, Cilais, Propecia and more but customers can also find other drugs that are listed under other health conditions. Some of their other popular categories include Anxiety, Asthma, Birth Control, Hair Loss, Weight Loss, Sleep Aid and Skin Care.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe prices offered are among the lowest available anywhere on the internet. Customers can also find similar discounts on almost all listed drugs.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomers can reach their customer support through their toll free phone numbers or email. Shipping is available for worldwide customers through free airmail delivery or faster EMS.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EGeneric-top-pharmacy.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews and online feedback is almost nonexistent anywhere on the internet that is alarming for a website that is in business for last 7 years. The only form of feedback is available in the form of customer testimonials posted on their own page. As the testimonials are moderated by the staff, all available testimonials are positive and in favor of their services and quality. This indicates that it is better to stay away from this company if possible.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003C\/div\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EExpress-scriptspharmacy.com Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EInformation about their special offers or discounts on their current plans is not available. Customers can check back later to find if there will be any new deals or offers. Similarly, coupon codes are also not available anywhere on the internet.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy represents a leading US based pharmacy service provider, Express Scripts but the online reputation of the company is extremely poor despite the fact that thousands of customers are on their plans. The number of online reviews is also among thousands but every single review is about a complaint or mistreatment from the customer service of the company. There are customers who are even taking a legal action against the incompetence of the company. They are called, morons, liars, cheats, rip offs, scammers, greedy and every kinds of negative term from customers. Based on the horrible online reputation, it only seems logical to stay away this company that are more often called legal rip offs. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/familydoctor-org-reviews-an-informational-website-with-information-about-health-and-related-issues\/","title":"Familydoctor.org Reviews – An Informational Website with Information about Health and Related Issues","url":"http:\/\/familydoctor.org","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/04\/Familydoctor.org-Review-880x320-1429928486.jpg","annotation":"Family Doctor is an online medical resource for families and other people to help them assist with learning about diseases and drugs to counter them. The website is owned and operated by the American Academy of Family Physicians (AAFP). The US based organization consists of more than 115,000 members that include family practice residents, family physicians and medical students. The content about medicines and medical condition is written and reviewed by the licensed physicians and professionals to make sure only quality information is available for the readers and visitors.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFamily Doctor is an online medical resource for families and other people to help them assist with learning about diseases and drugs to counter them. The website is owned and operated by the American Academy of Family Physicians (AAFP). The US based organization consists of more than 115,000 members that include family practice residents, family physicians and medical students. The content about medicines and medical condition is written and reviewed by the licensed physicians and professionals to make sure only quality information is available for the readers and visitors.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe information is available under different categories according to the age group and medical condition of readers like teens, kids, seniors, diseases and conditions, prevention and wellness, etc. Other than useful and informational articles written to provide helpful tips for the wellness of people, the website also offers access to free tools like BMI Calculator, Immunization Schedules and Nutrient Shortfall Questionnaire.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ETo contact the staff behind the website, interested people can send an email. The website also allows tips and information about finding a doctor or to get a right health insurance. The goal and mission of the website is to provide trusted and empowering information to readers that helps them take informed decisions about their health.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFamilydoctor.org Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFamilyDoctor.org represents an organization and serves as an informational website for visitors without doing any financial business. As the website does not sell anything, reviews are not available anywhere on the internet.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFamilydoctor.org Reviews 2014 \/ 2015\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is purely and informational website that earns only through advertising placed on their website. Reviews are not available as they serve only as an online blog and representation of American Academy of Family Physicians (AAFP).\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EFamilydoctor.org Coupon Codes\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is not selling anything so coupon codes or special offers related to online shopping are not available.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EConclusion\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe website is not an online pharmacy but an effort of an organization to provide useful and informational content to readers for free that can help educate them about health, wellness and how to take care of their families in need. The drugs are all imported directly from India where they are produced using the best quality materials in the state of the art factories.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EEvery drug available on the website is internationally certified and approved by the Food and Drug Association of India. With tons of experience in the field, the online pharmacy provides you with the medications that are best for you in terms of price and needs. The website provides direct calling numbers for US and UK residents.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThere is a long list of generic medicines available to the customers at an extremely competitive price, including, Viagra for $2.52 and Clomid, which is a fertility drug for women for $0.36. The information extracted from the website itself shows that the customers seem satisfied with the service, particularly, the pricing and delivery. However, there are other online pharmacies that offer generic medicines on lower prices. Also, the fact that there is not much information about the website available on other platforms shows that it is not one of the popular online pharmacies out there. The online store is designed to meet the medical needs of European customers. The online store is available in 6 different European languages including English and German. Till 2013, the website has processed more than half a million online orders.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe process is simple to follow. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/bm-pharmacy-reviews-a-popular-online-pharmacy-but-a-risk-for-financial-transactions\/","title":"Bm Pharmacy Reviews – A Popular Online Pharmacy but A Risk for Financial Transactions","url":"http:\/\/bmpharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/04\/Bmpharmacy.com-Review-880x320-1429878515.jpg","annotation":"BM Pharmacy is a global online pharmacy founded in 2002 that sells generic and brand name drugs to their worldwide customers. The online store is part of an online network of pharmacies that work under same parent company. The featured generics sold by the company are ED and sexual health drugs but customers can also find wide range of other drugs under different product categories like Weight Loss, Thyroid, Pain Control, Migraine and many more.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBM Pharmacy is a global online pharmacy founded in 2002 that sells generic and brand name drugs to their worldwide customers. The online store is part of an online network of pharmacies that work under same parent company. The featured generics sold by the company are ED and sexual health drugs but customers can also find wide range of other drugs under different product categories like Weight Loss, Thyroid, Pain Control, Migraine and many more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn addition to an array of options for customers, the prices offered by the pharmacy are also market competitive and very affordable. For example, Tadalfil 60 pills of 100 mg are available for only $105 while Finasteride 200 pills are available for only $100.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EThe online pharmacy offers limited options as payment methods that include direct bank transfer and eCheck. Paypal and payments through credit cards are not available yet. Customer service is available through toll free phone contact, live chat option and email. Worldwide shipping is available through registered airmail and 1\u003Csup\u003Est\u003C\/sup\u003E class airmail that are both free.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EBmpharmacy.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cdiv class=\u0022custom_quote\u0022 style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer feedback and reviews available online range from below average to average with few happy customers. At a popular review website, www.pharmacyreviewer.com, the website earned 3.6 accumulated reviews from 132 customer reviews. On the positive side, customer reviews are easily available in bulk that makes it a popular option among worldwide customers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003E\u003Cimg src=\u0022https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/04\/Bmpharmacy.com-Reviews.jpg\u0022 alt=\u0022Bmpharmacy.com Reviews\u0022 width=\u0022100%\u0022 class=\u0022aligncenter size-full wp-image-10289\u0022 \/\u003E\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003ECustomer reviews are mostly above average for most their low prices, but feedback about their quality and shipping time is average but their customer service was rated mostly below average. He called the company, “Too much of a hassle” as he tried 4 times to place an order but every time the websites returned in error.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EAccording to one complaint posted on www.complaintsboard.com in 2009, the customer called them scammers as they charged him $200 extra dollars out of his actual order.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp style=\u0022text-align: justify;\u0022\u003EIn response, there were few customers who commented that they are buying from the website and they never had such issues. Some of their popular products categories are Antibiotics, Mental Disorder, Women’s Health, Hypertension, Cardiovascular disease and more. The listed generic drugs are manufactured at renowned and licensed Indian manufacturers.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp\u003ETrusted Generics Online is a US based online pharmacy that sells generic drugs to their customers in North America and other parts of the world. The online pharmacy offers an array of generic drugs in addition to their featured ED and Sexual Health drugs. Almost all listed products are available without prescription with few exceptions where prescription is required. Some of their popular products categories are Antibiotics, Mental Disorder, Women’s Health, Hypertension, Cardiovascular disease and more. The listed generic drugs are manufactured at renowned and licensed Indian manufacturers.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThe prices offered at the trustedgenerics-online.com are rock bottom and it is hard to find any other source with lower prices. Generic Viagra that is mostly available for $0.9 to $1.1 per pill at wholesale price is only available for $0.69 per pill. Similarly, generic Amoxil is available for only $0.44. Similar prices differences are available for almost every listed drug that makes it one of the cheapest online sources online.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003ETo learn more about the online pharmacy, customers can reach their support through toll free phone contacts, live chat or email. {"Pharmacy":{"source":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/pickyourpharmacy-reviews-this-online-store-is-not-legit\/","title":"Pickyourpharmacy Reviews: This Online Store Is Not Legit","url":"http:\/\/pickyourpharmacy.com","image":"https:\/\/www.rxstars.net\/wp-content\/uploads\/2015\/03\/pickyourpharmacy.com_-880x320-1427450095.png","annotation":"Getting medications is one of the most crucial things. When you look at this site, you will realize that it is quite appealing and the process of ordering is very easy.","body":"\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-container\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-header\u0022\u003E\u003Ch4\u003E\u003C\/h4\u003E\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\u003Cdiv class=\u0022review-items\u0022\u003E \t\t\t\t \t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\t\t\t\u003C\/div\u003E \t\t\t\u003Cp\u003EGetting medications is one of the most crucial things. If you are in need of a store that offers quality medication to clients from all over the world, then pickyourpharmacy.com is your site. You do not need a prescription to be able to get medication dispensed on this site. This is one of the main advantages associated with this site. When you look at this site, you will realize that it is quite appealing and the process of ordering is very easy. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThere is also a wide range of products that are offered on this store for various conditions. However, part of the terms and conditions dictate that you must be a member on this site to be able to enjoy the services that they offer. While the general public can look at the products offered and even shop on this site, there are certain privileges that are reserved for members only. \u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EPickyourpharmacy.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThere are no consumer reviews for this store which is not a good thing. The online store, certified by CIPA, sells high quality generic drugs to their global customers through their international shipping. The website lists ED drugs as their featured and bestseller products but customers can also buy drugs for other medical conditions. In addition to ED and sexual health drugs, other popular product categories include allergies, asthma, birth control, hair loss, weight loss, skin care, pain relief, quit smoking and more.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003EThe prices offered by the store are among the lowest available anywhere on the internet. For example, the popular ED drug, generic Viagra is available for only $0.44 per pill that is almost 50% less than the average retail price. Similarly, Cialis is available for only $0.91 per pill. Customers can also take advantage of several ED trial packs to get further discount.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Cp\u003ECustomers can choose between airmail shipping that takes 2 to 3 weeks and courier service delivery that takes only 5 to 7 days for delivery. Customers can ask for free reshipment or full refund in case order doesn’t arrive. The website also offers full refund if customers are not satisfied with the delivered drugs. In such cases, customers can return the order within 30 days of the delivery of package. Customer service is reachable through email and dedicated separate phone numbers for North American and European customers. The website currently accepts Visa and MasterCard debit and credit cards as payment method.\u003C\/p\u003E \u003Ch2\u003EMeds-247.com Reviews\u003C\/h2\u003E \u003Cp\u003ECustomer reviews and feedback is limited but available response is all positive for the online store.
